Current time is: Mon Jan 26 23:42:27 2004 EST.
time

It is now 12:26 am on the 24th day of the 5th month in the year 317.

You have been adventuring for 32 mins, 3 secs this session.

l
>[Bank.]

The quiet hum of business fills your ears as you enter the Market Circle branch of the Rasnian Bank.  A long wooden desk at the far end of the room contains many tellers waiting to help you with your banking needs.  An open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, a bright wooden sign, and a smooth white sharpening stone are here.

This room is illuminated.
You see the 1st governor's dread knight.
In the room are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious exits: None.
>
Bant says in Secian, "tarks tarks... "

Bant beams.

Bant glances around.

Forsythia approaches a teller and they begin speaking quietly.

Bant exclaims in Secian, "next time!"

Forsythia says to Bant in Secian, "Not this time."

Bant shuffles his feet.

Forsythia nods.

You follow Forsythia through an open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door...

[Market Circle.]

An arch between two large buildings connects Market Circle and Market Street. The more reputable shopkeepers do business within the circle, but pay higher taxes for the privilege. The buildings have been built to last, as these merchants are no traveling tinkers. Interlocking stone walkways and colorful plantings span this central area. Despite the number of animals waiting outside the bank for their owners, the area is spotless. Loud chatter in many languages can be heard from the southwest.  A marble archway, an open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, and a wooden sign are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

You follow Forsythia through a marble archway...

[Market Street.]

Market Street ends here at a large archway. People bustle in and out of the arch, some without so much as a nod. The city wall rises up to the south and west of the buildings of Market Circle. A small sign is posted on the wall beside the archway.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: north*.

You follow Forsythia north...

[Market Street.]

Situated between the well-traveled Trade Way to the north and the fine shops of Market Circle to the south, this small stretch of road is busy at all times of day. Adventurers with sacks of plundered goods leave Market Street and head west. A shrewd businessman has set up shop in this busy area of the Market District.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st alley cat.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: north* south* west*.

You follow Forsythia north...

[Trade & Market.]

The buildings of Market Circle stand to the south. It becomes obvious that the area through the arch is a much cleaner marketplace than the bazaar. An inviting eatery stands beside the road, its door open to those weary after a long trip to Spur, as well as those preparing to venture to the great expanses beyond the west gate. A human couple exit the building, arm in arm. A small sign stands beside the intersection.  A sign, an open glossy lacquered oak door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: east* south* west*.

You follow Forsythia west...

[Trade Way.]

The throngs of travelers thicken as one heads east along Trade Way. An Anthian plays softly on a strange looking stringed instrument, her melodic voice filling the air. Judging by her clothing, and the number of silvers at her feet, she makes a fine living practicing her craft.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

Verbaniah just placed an iridescent shimmering silver teardrop within her open large leather backpack.

You follow Forsythia west...

[Trade Way.]

Deep grey mists surround a strange pile of rubble that lies south of the road. Occasionally a priest clad in a simple grey robe will wander past the rubble and whisper a short prayer under his breath. The fence running around the rubble is well kept, but the gate which once allowed entrance to this Temple has been chained closed.  A grey iron chained gate, a pile of rubble, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Forsythia west...

[Trade Way.]

From the city gate to the west, Trade Way continues eastward towards the busy Merchant district, past Joyeusse's Shop. The air is thick with the scent of fresh flowers. Wagons filled with goods bound for sale trundle past, their drivers hopeful of the anticipated profits. Eager young warriors venture towards the west gate and the dangers beyond.  An open carved rosewood door and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Forsythia west...

[Gateway.]

The relative safety inside Spur is a comfort to those returning from the fields and mountains. To those leaving, a massive wall of defense around the city lies ahead. Archer towers beside the gate overlook the wall, offering a painful welcome to would-be invaders. Several guards on foot patrol pass and disappear behind a thick, bluesteel banded steelwood door. Wall road stretches to the south, a wide passage between the city wall and several large buildings.  An open iron gate, an open thick stone door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st ork.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: east* south.

You follow Forsythia through an open iron gate...


l
The area brightens.
[Spur Gateway.]

Travelers from Rathan to the northwest, and the Trade Route to the south, converge at Spur's west gate. Guards posted on the ground give those seeking to enter the city a cursory once-over. Their lack of interest shows that anyone approaching has already been observed from above for some time. A grate in the ground loosens mud from wagon wheels and hooves before they pass through the gate, helping to keep the streets of Spur fairly clean.  An open giant black iron gate, a giant green oak tree, a small blue pool, a thick oak grate over the pool, and a polished stone marker are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: north south southwest west northwest.

The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

The path is flanked by countless tall oaks, swaying peacefully in the wind. They do their best to hide the sky from view, making it hard to tell night from day at times. Littering the area are pieces of broken wagon, bits of human remains and dried splotches of blood. The remnants of a violent fight lie all around you, whomever used to belong to the wagon is no more than vulture food.  A bloody severed foot is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying 10 feet below you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet below you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet below you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying 10 feet below you).

[West Spur Road.]

A dark foreboding forest is visible far off to the west. No grass grows near the forest. The grasslands shrink away from the grove as if even the plant life is afraid of it. There is a barren area between where the grass ends and the trees begin, giving the forest the illusion of isolation.

[West Spur Road.]

A dark twisted forest lies to the west, breaking the tranquil feel of the grasslands. The trees that are visible are twisted and deformed, the ground is scorched and blackened. A heavy ground fog seeps from deep within the forest carrying with it the acrid smell of death.

[West Spur Road.]

To the southwest the ghostly outline of a forest can be seen darkening the area around it like a blight upon the land. Grassy plains stretch out to the west. Swarms of tiny insects hover just above the grass, in some places the swarms are so dense they take on the appearance of being a single entity.

[West Spur Road.]

Farm animals graze in the distance. Their vague forms barely visible as they lumber about the tall grass. To the north the flat grassland gives way to the rolling foothills of the Great Divide. The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

A muddy pool of water lies to the north, nothing can be seen below its murky surface. The smell of rotting flesh rises from the pool and is carried for a great distance by the wind. The skeletal remains of what was once a cow lies half submerged in the water, its carcass picked clean by scavengers.

[West Spur Road.]

Thick brambles grow high and deep along both sides of the road. Sharp dagger-like thorns ready to welcome anyone unlucky enough to wander off the path. Small ragged pieces of cloth decorate the sharp thorns where some foolish travelers thought they could take a short cut.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast west.
>
You follow Forsythia west...


l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

Thick thorny brambles line the path, as a further reminder to travelers that straying from their heading may be unwise. The road looks poorly tended in places, most notably where the brambles have spread beyond its outer boundaries.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east* northwest.

You follow Forsythia northwest...


l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

Thorny vines reach out across the path making travel difficult. The thicket has become so overgrown that it is nearly impassable in places. The ground is worn by the soles of countless feet, making the dense wall of bramble seem even more out of place.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest.

l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

To the southeast the road disappears into a dense patch of thorny brambles. A burned out cart lies battered in a ditch at the side of the road. The cart bears the markings of the city of Rathan as well as those of the Rathene merchants guild.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast* west.

l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

A small clearing in the grass has been formed inside a cluster of large blackened rocks. The centerpiece to this well used rest area is a fire pit filled with charred wood and ash. Though the fire has burned out it still gives off a small amount of heat, suggesting it was used recently.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east* west.

l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

Patches of dandelions grow randomly about the roadside. Occasionally a breeze picks up and scatters their fluffy white pollen about the countryside, furthering the dandelions goal to cover every square inch of the grasslands.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

A crumbling arch lies off the path to the east. It stands as the last reminder of an inn that once offered solace to the weary that traveled this path. It can be discerned from the blackened color of the arch that the inn was the unfortunate victim of a fire.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

The Silver River cuts through the grassland and heads southeast towards Spur. Fishing boats, bearing the crest of the of city of Spur, dart around several barges laden with exotic wares to trade in the merchant city. Most bear the livery of the city of Rathan, but every so often a ship flying unfamiliar colors can be sighted.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: northeast southeast*.

l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

The western bank of the Silver River is composed of ankle-deep mud and slime the river washed upon the shore. A fish, that was unlucky enough to be swept ashore, flops itself about desperately trying to get back to the sanctuary of the water.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[West Spur Road.]

The path is muddy and in some places the murky water is knee-deep. The Silver River is constantly overflowing as the muddy path clearly points out. The shape of a bridge crossing the river can be made out just in the distance to the northwest.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st rabid dog.

A rabid dog enters, following Forsythia's group.

l
The area brightens.
[Northern Crossing.]

The massive stone bridge expands over the Silver River. The river rushes past where the remains of the past bridge fill the water below. A fine misty spray splashes up and hits the jagged stone fragments.

The area brightens.
[Northern Crossing.]

The bridge was built tall to allow the various merchant ships to pass under it. Its  height allows for a splendid view of the countryside, from Spur to the southeast, to the majestic peaks of the Great Divide.

l
The area brightens.
[Northern Crossing.]

The river surges strongly below you. Even from this height the noise of the flowing water is near deafening. Two small fishing boats nearly collide as they try to pass between the same set of supports. Only skillful sailing prevents them from hitting each other, or the supports. 

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[Northern Crossing.]

Extremely sturdy, though quickly rebuilt, the magnificent bridge spans across the mighty Silver River. Banners flutter in the breeze on both sides of the bridge, marking its reopening. Small gaps in the mortar are visible where the workers quickly pieced the stones together.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: north south*.

l
The area brightens.
[Northern Crossing.]

An osprey soars above the raging Silver River, scanning the water for a meal. Suddenly, it dives down to the surface and snatches a rather large trout from the water. The trout wriggles helplessly in the large birds grip as it is carried off on the western horizon.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

The area brightens.
[Northern Crossing.]

The massive stone bridge spans the mighty Silver River. The torrent of the river below rushes past the remains of the old bridge, carrying away bits of debris. Once heaping piles of building materials, now greatly dwindled lie discarded beside the bridge.  A broken wooden wagon is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

The outline of a tall stone bridge can be made out to the southwest. The sound of flowing water roars loudly from that direction as well. Grassland is all that the eye can see in the immediate area to the northwest. Though the Great Divide is visible in the distance, its massive snow-covered peaks extending to the heavens, making everything else seem small in comparison. 

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

Overflow from the nearby Silver River has turned much of the surrounding land into a muddy bog. Knee-deep and ice cold, the thick muddy water obscures the path from view. 

This area is illuminated.

The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

Small patches of solid ground lie hidden by murky, leech-infested water. The ground beneath the surface of the bog is uneven and has a tendency to drop off sharply without warning.

The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

Dead misshapen trees rise from the surface of the putrid water. Their ghostly forms claw up through the thick fog of foul-smelling marsh gas.

l
The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

A thin strip of solid ground cuts a precarious path through the center of the bog. Small bubbles of mud form just off the path, releasing noxious gasses as they burst. The mist thick cloud formed by the gas drops visibility to almost nothing.

This area is illuminated.

l
The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

A thick mist covers the ground, making it difficult to discern where solid footing lies. A large rock protrudes from the swampy water. Though shaped naturally, it could easily be mistaken for a dragon curled up in a comfortable sleep.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

The ground is moist and yielding. A thick layer of sludge covers everything in sight accompanied by a thin ground fog that recedes as it rolls toward the west, away from the swamp.

This area is illuminated.

Obvious paths: east* west.
[North Bridge Trail.]

The ground is moist and yielding. A thick layer of sludge covers everything in sight accompanied by a thin ground fog that recedes as it rolls toward the west, away from the swamp.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east west.
>
You follow Forsythia west...

The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

The air is thick with the foul odor of a nearby swamp. The ground, though firm, is damp and muddy. A thick fog clings to the ground to the east marking the spot where the swamp begins.

The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

Tall fields of grass cover the earth as far as the eye can see. The one exception is the travel-worn merchant road, which connects the city of Spur to the mountainous lands of the north. An occasional rustling can be heard just off the path as tiny creatures scurry about. 

This area is illuminated.

[North Bridge Trail.]

[North Bridge Trail.]

[North Bridge Trail.]

A large milestone stands prominently by the roadside. It must have been a dazzling sight in better times, but thieves have long since pried loose the inlaid gems from its surface. All that remains are small holes and scrape marks.

[North Bridge Trail.]

The surface of the road has been compacted by all the animals and merchants traveling across it. The occasional guard still patrols here, trying to keep the area safe for merchants and travelers.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: northeast south*.

[North Bridge Trail.]

A large house made of wood, logs, bark and other forest materials stands prominently in the middle of this small clearing. A small graveyard with many gravemarkers lies next to the house. Much of the ground in the graveyard has been upturned, and you feel you'd rather not know why.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: north south.
>
You follow Forsythia north...


l
The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

Large bloodstains mark the surrounding trees and roadsides. There must have been a terrific struggle here, and you pray that you don't meet the villain that was responsible. To the south, you see a plume of smoke billowing from amidst the trees.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: north south*.

The area brightens.
[North Bridge Trail.]

The road becomes much more rugged and rocky to the north, while a large expanse of forests covers the landscape to the south. The twists and turns in the road make it impossible to see far ahead. You grow apprehensive as you realize that the terrain is perfect for ambushes.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st carnivorous toad.

[Tarath Bends.]

Bant smiles.

In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east southwest.
>
Gwen grins at Forsythia.

You follow Forsythia east...

  You examine Bant the Dragon...
He appears to be in perfect health.
  You examine Gwen the Secian...
She appears to be in perfect health.
  You examine Aliyah the Secian...
She appears to be in perfect health.
  You examine Verbaniah the Secian...
She has no apparent injuries, but looks tired.
  You examine Forsythia the Dragon...
She appears to be in perfect health.

The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

What once was the intersection of two roads is now a single road paralleled by a massive amount of rock, mud and timber. To the northeast you see the remains of a large landslide.  The trail, which continues toward the west, is relatively quiet.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

Old trees lay side by side with the massive boulders of the mountain, intermingling in a terrible landslide. The mountain top has broken off and slid across the eastern road stopping all forms of transportation. It would take years for mortal hands to remove the tons of stone from the original roadway to make it passable once again. Thankfully, nature has changed the landscape for the better, and has opened a gap through the mountain to the north.

This area is illuminated.

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

A massive rent opens up between the mountain side heading south. Boulders sit precariously on the mountain side ready to fall to the ground. Many tons of earth have shifted from the face of the mountain to the ground, covering the small growth of forest at its base. The southeastern road is totally blocked with rubble.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast south* west.
[Tarath Bends.]

A massive rent opens up between the mountain side heading south. Boulders sit precariously on the mountain side ready to fall to the ground. Many tons of earth have shifted from the face of the mountain to the ground, covering the small growth of forest at its base. The southeastern road is totally blocked with rubble.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast south west.
>
You follow Forsythia west...


l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

The slope of the land begins to steepen as you make your way up the incline.  Beneath your feet the trail is slowly becoming more rock than dirt.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

[Tarath Bends.]

Grooves cut by water running down from the mountain show evidence of a recent heavy rain.  The path is partially blocked by the rocks and earth that have eroded from above.

The trail continues around a large pile of stones showing evidence of a landslide.  Beyond the rocks the trees can no longer be seen.

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Gorge.]

As you round the last bend your breath is taken away by the sheer length, width, and depth of the gorge that lies ahead. The area is scarred as if from mining, you notice small pieces of silver scattered about the area.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Gorge.]

As you continue you notice that the granite in this area has been deeply mined. Large granite boulders have been literally yanked from this gorge to reveal the ore that sat for centuries deep inside the earth.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

The area brightens.
[Tarath Gorge.]

Large pieces of shale and slate tower over you looking as if they will fall at any moment. Those that mined this area must not have cared much for safety. As you listen you hear soft rumbling as if the gorge could collapse at any time.

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Gorge.]

Rough granite walls rise above you to the east and west. The area here is a bit rougher and seems to have been recently mined. Large veins of silver can be seen. Up overhead, on the western face of the gorge wall a large crack has appeared. Though large enough to fit a Thugian, the only thing exiting the crack is a steady stream of dripping water.

The area brightens.
[Tarath Gorge.]

The gorge seems just as large on both sides of you as it did when you first entered it. The sedimentary rock layers in the cliffsides dazzle you with the richness of their color. Looking closer, you see tracks running up to the gate of a massive fort.

l
The area brightens.
[Fort Tarath.]

You stand before a granite wall and large double gated doors. The walls are thick and finely crafted, and there seems to be a rather aged look about them.  The Gate is made of massive slabs of silver, while off to the left and right are the fort's impressive walls, able to withstand a rather large invasion or army if need be.  An open silver-trimmed black drathain gate is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[Fort Tarath.]

The giant fortification wall is divided into two main sections by huge doors.  These doors have been made from silver and look as though they could stand even the most fearsome battering ram.  Guards standing atop the walls eye you closely.  To the north you can see the business district.  An open silver-trimmed black drathain gate is here.

This area is illuminated.

The area brightens.
[Fort Tarath.]

Each corner of this square gives entrance to one of the fort's four business establishments. The bank is small, but adequate. The pawnshop and store will see to your buying and selling needs, and the Tarath Wayside Inn is open at all hours to provide shelter for residents and foreigners alike.

The area brightens.
[Fort Tarath.]

Large barracks have been constructed here at the rear of the fort to house the on duty soldiers.  The buildings are made of wood and stone.  You shudder at the thought of how much effort it would take to get the lumber and other building supplies up the mountain.

The area brightens.
[Tarath Gorge and The Silver Strand.]

The gorge continues onward as far as the eye can see while a newly excavated road opens up northwest. Black soot and ash, along with grey flecked dust has settled on everything in the area. A cool breeze rushes in from the new roadway, blowing with it the scent of moist air.

This area is illuminated.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

This newly constructed road begins the climb to the mountain peaks as a vein from the main Rathan-Fort Tarath artery. Following the steep incline of the mountain's side, this twisting path travels its way to the opposite side of the City of Rathan. High above in that part of the mountain, a single silver-spired tower peaks through the misty mountain air and glistens slightly.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest.

This newly constructed road begins the climb to the mountain peaks as a vein from the main Rathan-Fort Tarath artery. l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The roadway straightens out to the west but continues its incline along the base of the mountain. The walls of Fort Tarath stand tall between the walls of the gorge almost as if daring an army to try and breech them. Large piles of blackened rubble, the product of the roadway excavation, fill the narrow valley between the road edge and the mountain to the south.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

Small shrubs cling to the mountain side above the roadway, helping to sway the effects of erosion and the buffeting winds. A few small rocks, black and scorched, poke through the road close to the southern dropaway. Cold air blows down from the higher parts of the mountain, shaking leaves and dust into a frenzy every so often.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east* west.
[The Silver Strand.]

Small shrubs cling to the mountain side above the roadway, helping to sway the effects of erosion and the buffeting winds. A few small rocks, black and scorched, poke through the road close to the southern dropaway. Cold air blows down from the higher parts of the mountain, shaking leaves and dust into a frenzy every so often.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east west.
>
You follow Forsythia west...


l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

Jagged rocks thrust themselves into the air nearer the edge of the roadway. Small rocks cover the path along with thick dust and ash. The stench of burning timbers floats in on the breeze.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east* northwest.

>
You follow Forsythia northwest...


l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

High above the mountain base the roadway makes its climb toward the peak. Down below the cliff falls off suddenly into the valley. The sheer drop from the edge would crush even the largest animal on the boulders below. Wind blows up from the valley floor and down from the cliffs above, tugging at clothing, packs and living beings alike.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

A huge boulder, imbedded within the side of the mountain, partially blocks the road. The boulders face is black and sooty, but no form of blasting seems to have made a dent. The roads direction was obviously changed to reflect this small problem.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

Small birds fly high overhead, circling this part of the road. The span from the edge of the road to the southern mountain face is not very far, however the drop into the valley would be suicide. On that mountain side a small cave yawns its opening next to a narrow ledge. Perhaps one could jump down to it without falling to their death...

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The near vertical face of the mountain soars overhead. Southwest the road straightens once again as it travels further up the mountain. Fort Tarath and the gorge road are completly hidden from this portion of the road.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The air has become thin and cold making travel more difficult. Black and grey stone dust blows to and fro along the road and over the edge into the valley below. Small pebbles tumble down from above announcing the presence of something higher up.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

A small crack in the road spills forth a small stream of dirty brown water. Nearer the road edge, close to the drop down the mountain side, the erosion is terrible. In time, if the flow of water continues, the road may wash away without much of a trace.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

Misty clouds hang close to the mountain side, partially covering the road and making traveling dangerous. In some spots the mist is so thick, the edge of the road is hidden from view. Caution is needed when traveling this path.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The side of the mountain rises up to meet with the roadway higher on the mountain. Damp and cold air mixes with the warm breeze from down below making small clouds appear here and there.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

A stumble or trip would send anyone falling headlong, over the edge of the road and down, down onto the broken rocks far below. Wind whips around the corner from the southwest, blowing dust and debris into the air. Small loose rocks line the pathway making each step a dangerous course of action.

This area is illuminated.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The mountains of the Great Divide stretch to the north and west as far as the eyes can see. Snow tipped peaks glisten in the daylight hours and sparkle under the stars at night. Large clouds hang above the peaks moving in the upper currents.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

Up above this portion of road the pathway turns back toward the east. From the edge of the road one can stare upward and follow that part of the road til it bends once again to the west. Though the distance from here to there isnt great, what lies past that is only a guess.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

Far upward and northwest a massive tower stands near the peak of the mountain. Massive clouds float at its base blocking whatever route to the tower from view. The towers single spire gleams brightly, the silver polished heavily. Not much more can be assertained about the tower from this position.

This area is illuminated.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The edge of the road slopes downward a bit to the roadway beneath and then further down into the valley below. The air is crisp and cold at this altitude, breath clouding in front of your mouth.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The roadway is wet and moldy. Small puddles of water cover the floor, some bubbling hotly, their steam rising into the air. Greenish mold surrounds most of the puddles and lines the base of the mountain where the road butts up against it.

This area is illuminated.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The road underfoot is black and marred, its surface covered with sticky soot and ash. A large water stain stretches from a hole high over head, down the eastern mountain face, and over the road edge to the area below. A few brackish puddles stand on the roads surface, smelling strangely like animal waste.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The road has changed from grey stone and dirt to a reddish clay. Different layers of soil show through the mountain wall. Even a narrow strip of silver travels across the mountains face and follows the road as it inclines.

This area is illuminated.

l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

Another massive boulder, black and melted, blocks any further passage toward the top of the mountain. Thick grey and white clouds hang heavily near the edge of the road, swirling ever so slightly in the breeze. There is no way to continue up the mountain except perhaps by climbing the sheer cliff wall. The clouds pulse slightly and gravitate toward the road surface, the sound of thunder rolling over the area. 

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast*.

Obvious paths: southeast.
>
You follow Forsythia through some white billowy clouds...


l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

A ribbon of pure silver stretches out through the billowing clouds toward the peak of the mountain. Each step is like walking on soft carpeting but without any solid underfooting to hold one up. Any movement on the silver strand makes the surface flow like the waves on the ocean, rippling into the distance.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast* west.
[The Silver Strand.]

A ribbon of pure silver stretches out through the billowing clouds toward the peak of the mountain. Each step is like walking on soft carpeting but without any solid underfooting to hold one up. Any movement on the silver strand makes the surface flow like the waves on the ocean, rippling into the distance.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: southeast west.
>
You follow Forsythia west...


l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The strand twists and stretches and in some parts is not entirely there. Large holes open and close on its surface but without fail passage over these rifts is made without any problems. Above and surrounding the strand, the billowing clouds make up the walls of a silky tunnel, flickering with light and the sounds of rolling thunder every so often. The tunnel leads east to a solid mountain roadway and west into a blur.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east* west.
[The Silver Strand.]

The strand twists and stretches and in some parts is not entirely there. Large holes open and close on its surface but without fail passage over these rifts is made without any problems. Above and surrounding the strand, the billowing clouds make up the walls of a silky tunnel, flickering with light and the sounds of rolling thunder every so often. The tunnel leads east to a solid mountain roadway and west into a blur.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east west.
>
You follow Forsythia west...


l
The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The strand and tunnel end abruptly before you, dispersing in the strong wind that blows down from the mountain. The next steps will have you hundreds of feet above the mountain base, standing on nothing but air, all solid footing gone. Across this long gap, on its otherside, the silver strand and the cloud tunnel begin again, making their way toward the mountain tower.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: east* west.

l
The area brightens.
[Sky.]

There is nothing here but the open expanse of sky. A silvery walkway ends quite close to the east, its semi-solid footing welcome to most who cannot fly. Far northeast another part of the strand waits for a traveler to set foot on its surface to continue the journey up the mountain. A strong wind blows down from the mountain peak, attempting to bring the massive drop to the ground quickly and painfully to anyone stupid enough to wander out into the sky.  A fiery gate in the sky is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 15 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: northeast east*.

The area brightens.
[Sky.]

Nothing but sky and mountains stretch out on all sides. The drop from this height would surely be deadly to anyone. A sliver of silver glints in the distance, rolling slightly within a wall of clouds. To the northeast, as if floating in the sky, a large tower hovers under it's own power. A small white curl of smoke reaches out from the tower towards the small silver path.  Some alabaster upwards leading stairs are here.

This area is illuminated.

The area brightens.
[The Silver Strand.]

The narrow silver strand bends and stretches as it begins again. Billowing clouds part long enough for one to glimpse the entire southern half of Tarath Bends in all of its majesty. Though the strand carries its travelers higher above the mountain, the walk itself acts as if one were walking a level roadway.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st mountain goat, the 2nd mountain goat, and the 3rd mountain goat.

[The Crystal Tower.]

A massive purple crystal tower soars overhead, its silver spire polished to a bright shine. The walls pulse slightly as if beating like a massive heart. The mountain peak rises high on either side of the building, cradling the tower in its grasp. A massive gate protects the tower interior from any who do not belong.   An open silver-trimmed purple crystal gate is here.

This room is illuminated.

[Ilmand's Tower, Ground Floor.]

A mass of white polished marble makes up the floor and ceiling of this cylindrical ground floor. Dark purple walls enclose the tower, inclining slightly as they rise up to meet the ceiling. The entire ground floor is open, the rear wall completely visible and swirling with different purple hues. A glimmer of silver can be seen rising through the ceiling in the northwest.  An open silver-trimmed purple crystal gate is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

You follow Forsythia north...

[Ilmand's Tower, Ground Floor.]

The center of the tower boasts a huge silver scarab etched into the floor. The scarabs wings are stretched out to either side, almost touching the far walls of the tower. Massive purple diamonds have been set into the etching throughout the scarab's wings. The diamonds have been smoothed and leveled with the surface of the floor. 

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious exits: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

You follow Forsythia northwest...

[Ilmand's Tower, Ground Floor.]

The silver-trim of this delicate stairway shines brightly whenever a light source is brought near. Rising up through the ceiling, this spiraling stairway is the only route to the second floor. Though a lighter shade of purple, the stairway blends almost identically with the surrounding walls of the tower.  A silver-trimmed spiraling crystal stairway is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious exits: east* southeast* south*.

You follow Forsythia through a silver-trimmed spiraling crystal stairway...

[Ilmand's Tower, Second Floor.]

Like the first floor, the walls of the second rise up and angle slightly inward from floor to ceiling. Because of this, the area of the second floor is noticeably smaller then that of the first. However everything else is identical such as the deep purple crystal of the walls and the pulsing light from within.  A silver-trimmed spiraling crystal stairway is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

[Ilmand's Tower, Second Floor.]

A cool breeze blows down from the third floor landing, bringing with it the scents of magickal herbs. The walls glow brightly, the surface totally smooth and cool to the touch. A strange powdery substance, silver in color, covers the floor around the base of the stairway.  A silver-trimmed spiraling crystal stairway is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

[Ilmand's Tower, Third Floor.]

Strange and wonderful smells assault the senses at the top of the spiral staircase. Odd clicking and the sound of birds singing can be hear all around, though there are no animals or anything else around to make them. The air is thick and misty, almost as if the clouds had rolled in on top of you.  A silver-trimmed spiraling crystal stairway is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

[Ilmand's Tower, Third Floor.]

The scent of sulfur and something metalic is very powerful in this part of the tower. A black and grey dust covers the floor but does not hinder movement in any way. Hovering above the portal and spinning on its axis is a small blue box, its purpose unknown.  A swirling magnesium portal is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).

You follow Forsythia through a swirling magnesium portal...

[Study and Training Room.]

A row of red velvet padded chairs lines the entire perimeter of the room. Two long tables parallel each other in the center of the room, their carved obsidian tops holding scores of papers, books and parchments. This room is extremely quiet, be it from magickal or nonmagickal means, it is a wonderful place to bury ones face in study.  A swirling magnesium portal is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious exits: southeast*.

You follow Forsythia southeast...

[Laboratory and Experiment Area.]

Long tables filled with various magickal devices, scrolls and containers of strange items line the far corner walls forming an "L". The walls pulse slightly, the purple glow covering almost every item within the room, giving everything a strange purple hue. Powerful magickal energy flashes through the air every so often, the reddish-blue bolts dancing off the walls, ceiling and floor. An odd Thugian sized box rests against the rear wall; piles of crystal, drathian and granite dust lay on the floor.  A glowing white archway is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious exits: northwest*.
You pay the 5gp fee and enter.

You follow Forsythia through a glowing white archway...


As you pass through, there is a twist, and a feeling of distance...

[Barren beach.]

The black sands of this beach give mute testimony to the volcanic origins of this island. The ocean to the south and west sends waves crashing against the shore. Overhead, a lone gull cries in the still air.  A glowing white archway is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: north northeast east northwest.

You follow Forsythia east...

[Palm grove.]

The grove of palms is thicker here. To the northeast in fact, it becomes impassable. Directly to the north, you catch a glimpse of a tiny grass hut. A narrow path leads off to the east along the cliff face.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying beside you).
Obvious paths: north east south southwest west northwest.

[Shadowy Lair]

The darkness of this area is unmatched by the outer cave. You have entered a winding tunnel carved out of solid volcanic rock, perhaps a burned out age old lava tube. Now only sheer blackness flows through this tunnel. You have trouble with your sense of direction, the only beacon being the silvery door to the south.  A giant silvery door, a short steel butcher knife, a square headed copper war hammer, a hardened leather barbuta, a crude wooden lockpick, a short iron frying pan, a crude wooden lockpick, an iron rolling pin, and a small cup of green tea are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: northwest.
[Shadowy Lair]

The darkness of this area is unmatched by the outer cave. You have entered a winding tunnel carved out of solid volcanic rock, perhaps a burned out age old lava tube. Now only sheer blackness flows through this tunnel. You have trouble with your sense of direction, the only beacon being the silvery door to the south.  A giant silvery door, a short steel butcher knife, a square headed copper war hammer, a hardened leather barbuta, a crude wooden lockpick, a short iron frying pan, a crude wooden lockpick, an iron rolling pin, and a small cup of green tea are here.

[Shadowy Lair]

Here the tunnel takes a dark turn, almost causing you to run into the wall. The jagged hardened spikes of ash look less than inviting. The shadows slowly begin to converge all around you. Total silence echos throughout the place. Did your own shadow just move?  A smooth white sharpening stone, a closed small hardened leather weapon sheath, a tiny shrunken skull pendant, a tiny shrunken skull pendant, and an open mended bearskin pouch are here.

This area is illuminated.

A tiny shrunken skull pendant, a small iron cooking pot, a short steel butcher knife, a small iron cooking pot, a crude wooden lockpick, a small iron cooking pot, a heavy leather skullcap, a smooth white sharpening stone, a crystal encrusted copper bowl, a short bloody steel rock hammer, a smooth white sharpening stone, a glowing holy mark of Odarous, and a small radiant rose quartz bead are here.

This room is illuminated.

[Shadowy Lair.]

Shadows dance along the smooth black walls, mimicking your movements. A hot breeze winds its way along the tunnel wrapping itself around you, a weakened echo of the fierce fire that once formed these walls.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st shadow imp.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: southeast southwest* northwest.

[Shadowy Lair.]

Shadows dance along the smooth black walls, mimicking your movements. A hot breeze winds its way along the tunnel wrapping itself around you, a weakened echo of the fierce fire that once formed these walls.  A gold coin, some silver coins, a heavy blackened bronze full-plate mail, a stag horned bone helm, and a closed tan leather portfolio are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: southeast southwest northwest.

[Shadowy Lair.]

Glassy black stalactites hang from the ceiling, closing off the already narrow tunnel. Their dripping water echoes musically through the tunnel, bouncing off the smooth walls building to an eerie symphony.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st shadow devil and the 2nd shadow devil.

[Shadowy Lair.]

Shadows dance along the smooth black walls, mimicking your movements. A hot breeze winds its way along the tunnel wrapping itself around you, a weakened echo of the fierce fire that once formed these walls.  A heavy blackened bronze full-plate mail, a stag horned bone helm, an open tan leather portfolio, an obsidian encrusted iron collar, a short iron frying pan, a tiny shrunken skull pendant, an iron rolling pin, and a dead grey mouse are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st shadow devil, the 2nd shadow devil, the 3rd shadow devil, and the 4th shadow devil.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: southeast southwest northwest.
Bant claws at the shadow devil!
The attack misses its target.
Bant claws again at the shadow devil!
The attack misses by a slim margin.

[Shadowy Lair.]

Glassy black stalactites hang from the ceiling, closing off the already narrow tunnel. Their dripping water echoes musically through the tunnel, bouncing off the smooth walls building to an eerie symphony.  A closed rusting platinum chest, a large glimmering garnet, and an open striped canvas pouch are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.

[Shadowy Lair.]

As you move deeper through the tunnel and the darkness grows thicker, you sense an oddity.  The shadows have not yet seemed to blend into the surroundings as you know they should.  You wonder if you are seeing things.    An open crafted leopardskin sack is here.

This room is illuminated.

Obvious exits: north southeast southwest*.

[Shadowy Lair.]

As you move deeper through the tunnel and the darkness grows thicker, you sense an oddity.  The shadows have not yet seemed to blend into the surroundings as you know they should.  You wonder if you are seeing things.    A shovel, a short carbide stake, a smooth white sharpening stone, some gold coins, a crude wooden lockpick, a pair of tanned fingerless leather gloves, a quiver of black fletched wooden bolts, and some gold coins are here.

This room is illuminated.
You see the 1st shadow beast and the 2nd shadow beast.
In the room are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious exits: north southeast southwest.

The blue glow fades from his hands.

[Shadowy Lair.]

Shadows dance along the smooth black walls, mimicking your movements. A hot breeze winds its way along the tunnel wrapping itself around you, a weakened echo of the fierce fire that once formed these walls.  A swirling multicolored globe, a serrated edged steel discus, a closed emblazoned black leather lockpick case, and a closed stained calfhide bag are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st shadow beast.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: southeast southwest northwest.

[Shadowy Lair]

You stumble along further into the darkness.  Your shadow seems to move more quickly than yourself along the ash covered walls. [Shadowy Lair]

The darkness of this area is unmatched by the outer cave. You have entered a winding tunnel carved out of solid volcanic rock, perhaps a burned out age old lava tube. [Shadowy Lair]

Here the tunnel takes a dark turn, almost causing you to run into the wall. The jagged hardened spikes of ash look less than inviting. The shadows slowly begin to converge all around you. Total silence echos throughout the place. Did your own shadow just move?  A crude wooden lockpick, a dead grey mouse, a small iron cooking pot, a crude wooden lockpick, a closed dull bronze coffer, and some silver coins are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian (holding a spent glowing swirling multicolored globe), Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: northeast southeast.

[Shadowy Lair]

You stumble along further into the darkness.  Your shadow seems to move more quickly than yourself along the ash covered walls.  The tunnel forks here in equally dark directions, although a warm breeze can be felt from the northeast.  A tiny shrunken skull pendant, a crude wooden lockpick, a strange glass monocle, a short iron frying pan, a glowing holy mark of Odarous, a small amber crystal rune sphere, a white wax candle, a closed crude burlap bag, and some silver coins are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian, Verbaniah the Secian (flying beside you and holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.

[Barren beach.]

The black sands of this beach give mute testimony to the volcanic origins of this island. The ocean to the south and west sends waves crashing against the shore. Overhead, a lone gull cries in the still air.  A glowing white archway is here.

This area is illuminated.

You follow Forsythia through a glowing white archway...


As you pass through, there is a twist, and a feeling of distance...

[Laboratory and Experiment Area.]

Long tables filled with various magickal devices, scrolls and containers of strange items line the far corner walls forming an "L". The walls pulse slightly, the purple glow covering almost every item within the room, giving everything a strange purple hue. Powerful magickal energy flashes through the air every so often, the reddish-blue bolts dancing off the walls, ceiling and floor. An odd Thugian sized box rests against the rear wall; piles of crystal, drathian and granite dust lay on the floor.  A glowing white archway is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian, Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.

[Study and Training Room.]

A row of red velvet padded chairs lines the entire perimeter of the room. Two long tables parallel each other in the center of the room, their carved obsidian tops holding scores of papers, books and parchments. [Ilmand's Tower, Third Floor.]

Strange and wonderful smells assault the senses at the top of the spiral staircase. Odd clicking and the sound of birds singing can be hear all around, though there are no animals or anything else around to make them. [Ilmand's Tower, Second Floor.]

A cool breeze blows down from the third floor landing, bringing with it the scents of magickal herbs. The walls glow brightly, the surface totally smooth and cool to the touch. [Ilmand's Tower, Second Floor.]

Like the first floor, the walls of the second rise up and angle slightly inward from floor to ceiling. Because of this, the area of the second floor is noticeably smaller then that of the first. The silver-trim of this delicate stairway shines brightly whenever a light source is brought near. Rising up through the ceiling, this spiraling stairway is the only route to the second floor. [Ilmand's Tower, Ground Floor.]

One of the larger golems stands straight against the wall, this one different from the others, its massive body almost completely clear and hard as a rock. [Ilmand's Tower, Ground Floor.]

A mass of white polished marble makes up the floor and ceiling of this cylindrical ground floor. Dark purple walls enclose the tower, inclining slightly as they rise up to meet the ceiling. [The Crystal Tower.]

A massive purple crystal tower soars overhead, its silver spire polished to a bright shine. The walls pulse slightly as if beating like a massive heart. [Fort Tarath, Pawnshop.]

For a second-hand outpost store, this shop is kept in remarkably good condition.  Shelves, racks, and hooks line the walls, all filled with previously owned items.  Swords and shields hang from the ceiling, reflecting the lamplight across the floor. [Fort Tarath, Pawnshop.]

For a second-hand outpost store, this shop is kept in remarkably good condition.  Shelves, racks, and hooks line the walls, all filled with previously owned items.  Swords and shields hang from the ceiling, reflecting the lamplight across the floor.  An exit, a swirling multicolored globe, and a large blue crystal are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake, Gwen the Secian, Aliyah the Secian, Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious paths: None.

This area is illuminated.

Obvious paths: north south.
>
You follow Forsythia south...


l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Gorge.]

As you round the last bend your breath is taken away by the sheer length, width, and depth of the gorge that lies ahead. The area is scarred as if from mining, you notice small pieces of silver scattered about the area.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying 5 feet above you).
Obvious paths: north* southeast.

The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

The trail continues around a large pile of stones showing evidence of a landslide.  Beyond the rocks the trees can no longer be seen.
