l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

A massive rent opens up between the mountain side heading south. Boulders sit precariously on the mountain side ready to fall to the ground. Many tons of earth have shifted from the face of the mountain to the ground, covering the small growth of forest at its base. The southeastern road is totally blocked with rubble.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying 5 feet above you).

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

Old trees lay side by side with the massive boulders of the mountain, intermingling in a terrible landslide. The mountain top has broken off and slid across the eastern road stopping all forms of transportation. It would take years for mortal hands to remove the tons of stone from the original roadway to make it passable once again. Thankfully, nature has changed the landscape for the better, and has opened a gap through the mountain to the north.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying 5 feet above you).

The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

Piles of rubble flank the road on both sides. Some new and some old, this rubble is a mixture of two guard towers and this side of the mountain. High above, the jagged peak of the small mountain thrusts itself out over the road, ready to collapse under the right circumstances. A new rent has been cut into the southeastern side of the mountain, allowing passage to the southern road.

This area is illuminated.

[Tarath Bends.]

The mountain side has broken away and has fallen across the southern road. Sharp boulders poke through mounds of smaller rocks and mud, blocking the old roadway. Nature has a way of changing what man does, as is apparent by the natural roadway crossing through the rubble to the northwest.

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

You're trudging along a level, man-made road that cuts along the Tarath Bends.  To the east, the road fragments into a rocky landslide that obviously occured long ago.  The road continues to the west.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying 5 feet above you).
Obvious paths: northeast west*.
[Tarath Bends.]

You're trudging along a level, man-made road that cuts along the Tarath Bends.  To the east, the road fragments into a rocky landslide that obviously occured long ago.  The road continues to the west.

>
You follow Forsythia northeast...


l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

You walk along the rocky slope of the Tarath Bends and the elevation is getting quite high.  The air is cool here, and you glance northward at the knife-edged peaks that stretch impossibly in the distance, much higher than here.  

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying 5 feet above you).

To the northeast you see the remains of a large landslide.  The trail, which continues toward the west, is relatively quiet.

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

What once was the intersection of two roads is now a single road paralleled by a massive amount of rock, mud and timber. A new landslide covers the older settled debris making passage to the northeast impossible. Rocks and pebbles lay across the path making movement precarious. The new landslide still groans and shifts ever so slightly.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian (flying beside you), Aliyah the Secian (flying 5 feet above you), Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake (flying 5 feet above you).
Obvious paths: southeast southwest*.

The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

This is a rather level part of the track that winds its way around the mountain. The track is covered with large rocks and stones, and the west wall of the mountain looks like it has crumbled away. The track drops off sharply to the south.

You pick your way over rocks and bushes as you walk along a rugged path. Far below you in the valley, you can see the remains of the road that runs toward Spur. The track continues to twist and turn east and west from here.

Walking along the bottom of a valley between the hills and the mountains, you see the mountains to the north that rise majestically out of the earth. A track weaves and twists up the mountain side from here.

[Tarath Bends.]

The earth trembles as the newly formed landslide continues to settle. Small rocks and other debris tumble from the top and sides of the formation. The landslide rises, insurmountable to the east and southwest, however from this point one could traverse the peak to the other side.

[Crumbling Fissure.]

The narrow fissure slopes upward and opens up to the northwest. Through the walls of the gap you can catch a slight glimpse of the mountain peaks above Rathan. A cold wind blows in from that direction, bringing with it the dusty smell of snow.

l
The area brightens.
[Tarath Bends.]

A tree has fallen across the northeast path. However, the tree is rotting and all the needles have dried up and fallen off, and it hardly creates an obstacle for you.

>                        You have visualized the following locations
                        -------------------------------------------

                                    Visualization #1 is:
Mysterious mists form the barrier around this strange garden. Nothing can be seen of the route you took to get here. Giant sized flowers bloom all around you, each one a different color and shade. A lush carpet of jewel green grass cushions your feet. The call of exotic birds echo through the air. Breaking through the path of flowers you come upon a small clump of peach trees. Luscious fruits hang from their drooping branches. Some have already been plucked and placed in a large straw basket. At the center of the stand of trees is spread a large quilted blanket. Upon closer examination of the quilt you notice each square shows a different stage of being in the life of a dragon. Quiet descends around you, filling the area with a sense of peace.

                                    Visualization #2 is:
Four sturdy walls and a roof of woven branches enclose this small tavern. From the forest floor, winding their way around the trunk of the Mother Tree, a set of intricately railed steps serve as the entrance and exit of the town of Treehaven. Strangers arriving at the top of the steps find themselves under the watchful eye of patrons seated at tables positioned about the light, airy room. A set of oak steps lead up to the new Council chambers.

                                    Visualization #3 is:
An abundant gallery of paintings depicting sacrifices and hold offerings to their god suspend from crooked iron nails. Resting beside each painting, cold black iron braziers appear to hold burned blood and bone. A few charred, blackened pieces can be found in them. Several iron chains hang along the walls of the sacrificial chamber. Along the floor, intricately placed colored slate tiles are coated in dust covered dried blood. Centering the room is a raised platform accessible through a flight of stairs. Upon this raised formation rests an altar inlaid with rows and rows of teeth. 

Your active visualization is #1

[Bond Garden.]

Mysterious mists form the barrier around this strange garden. Nothing can be seen of the route you took to get here. Giant sized flowers bloom all around you, each one a different color and shade. A lush carpet of jewel green grass cushions your feet. The call of exotic birds echo through the air. Breaking through the path of flowers you come upon a small clump of peach trees. Luscious fruits hang from their drooping branches. Some have already been plucked and placed in a large straw basket. At the center of the stand of trees is spread a large quilted blanket. Upon closer examination of the quilt you notice each square shows a different stage of being in the life of a dragon. Quiet descends around you, filling the area with a sense of peace.  A long vine, an open deep ribboned picnic basket, and a large multicolored quilted blanket are here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: None.

The wind rises as you appear in a spiral of leaves!

>[Bond Garden.]

Mysterious mists form the barrier around this strange garden. Nothing can be seen of the route you took to get here. Giant sized flowers bloom all around you, each one a different color and shade. A lush carpet of jewel green grass cushions your feet. The call of exotic birds echo through the air. Breaking through the path of flowers you come upon a small clump of peach trees. Luscious fruits hang from their drooping branches. Some have already been plucked and placed in a large straw basket. At the center of the stand of trees is spread a large quilted blanket. Upon closer examination of the quilt you notice each square shows a different stage of being in the life of a dragon. Quiet descends around you, filling the area with a sense of peace.  A long vine, an open deep ribboned picnic basket, and a large multicolored quilted blanket are here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: None.
go vi
>[Day.]

Bright light fills this room at all times of day, reminding of pure, natural sunlight.  The rays of illumination have a brassy tint to them, creating a warm hued glow upon the simple furniture of this open-air room. Only one wall stands here, a divider to some unseen area; covered in brilliant emerald vines, splitting and taking over through cracks and niches. A single dark green vine appears sturdy enough to climb. A handmade bronze sun rests upon the wall, attached at the rough hammered points, only barely visible through the vines. Furniture built of bronze and brass center around a small pond within the center of the room. Hardly deep, a few metallic-hued fish can be seen through the emerald greenish mossy waters. When night turns to day, the bronze sun glows momentarily as a pale blue mist comes from within it, creating a magickal faux sky overhead resembling that of noon time; slowly it fades away as the day truly changes and the stars outside fade from few.  A deep crack in the wall and a smooth ebony archway are here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: None.
go ar
ready lan
>It's too dark to see anything!  Ready a torch.
>You light the lantern.

l
The area brightens.
>[Night.]

Upon entering this pitch black painted circular room it is difficult to find your bearings at first. Much darker in hue than the rest of the areas, the decor has been styled to represent a midnight sky.  An ebony archway barely visible rests on the far wall, magick surrounding it, preventing visibility into the area on the other side. Astonishing platinum stars inlaid into the ceiling flicker in the low pillar candle light.  Magickal platinum flamed candles made of deep black beeswax rest upon small round ebony tables.  Light fluffy pillows shaped to resemble clouds are stacked in three corners, dark blue and indigo in shade.  A few warm fleece blankets are stacked upon a black marble shelf carved into the wall, allowing visitors to keep warm even on the coldest of nights.  A winding wrought iron railed staircase, a closed smooth black marble box dotted with stars, and a smooth ebony archway are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: None.
go wr
>I don't see what you are referring to.
go rai
>[Entryway.]

A smooth gray marble floor flecked with white spreads out beneath you. A constant, calming sound of trickling water can be heard from a small matching marble fountain in the center. The fresh water trickles down from the three-tiered fountain spreading over little black and white pebbles in the basin. Pillows of bright colors, large and small, line the corner of the room, providing an inviting place for conversations and relaxation. A winding staircase with a thick wrought iron railing wraps its way upwards, only to grow hazy with wisps of mist as it reaches the ceiling. A few carved marble benches line the fountain for those that wish to sit next to it, the feet of the seating resembling that of a clawed Dragon. Affixed to one of the walls is a small plaque made of a blackened silvery-gray metal.  A blackened silver-trimmed plaque, a tall flowing marble fountain, and a mist covered cobblestone pathway are here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: north* east* south* west*.
go pa
>[Pathway Garden.]

Cheerful laughter can be heard echoing through this open air garden as wisps of bright colors flash past. Secians run and play a game of mid-flight tag, merrily flying past one another as their rainbow wings become a blur. Gray flecked white marble benches line a small, deep blue pool filled with cool, tranquil waters with the exception of a stray duck making a crash-landing. Various sorts of flowers from every imaginable part of Aradath sprout in full bloom in all areas, nearly overtaking the pathway. A red rosebush stands out in particular, well kept, the flowers bloom brilliantly opening to the sun. The scent of delicate floral mixed with fresh grass and tall, green leafed trees makes for an intoxicatingly fresh aroma.  A red rosebush and a mist covered cobblestone pathway are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north.
n
>[Mystical Garden.]

The garden is surrounded by a non-symmetrical stone wall done in earthen shades, yellow roses and wild vines clinging to its stony face. A small mosaic just barely peeking out from the mass of flowers and leaves can be viewed as the sun rises. In the midst of it all, a large willow tree spreads its massive branches over the area, colorful paper lanterns hanging within. A lush blanket of natural carpet, deep green clover spouting from the ground to form a soft pathway. The edge of the pond reaches to the edge of the path, the beginning of a breathtaking garden starting here. In the distance the calls of ducks and other wildlife can be heard. From one of the tallest tree branches, the echoing hum of busy bees sound from a golden beehive, the scent of honey filling the air with a delightful aroma.  An earthen stone wall mosaic and a closed vine entwined silver gate are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: south*.

>[Willow Hill.]

The scent of fresh, green trodden grass, and the gentle rustling of the golden leaves overhead delighted the senses. On the edge of the property, a waterfall trickles over an embankment of several large white stones into a light green pool below. The glistening water travels down a slow moving stream caring fallen leaves and grass.  A glistening stream and an open vine entwined silver gate are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north.

>You close the open vine entwined silver gate.
n
>[Raine Estates.]

Several majestic willow trees, with their long drooping branches, stand at the top of a gently sloping hill. A slight wind blows among the trees and grass in this flowery meadow while a trickling stream flows among the boulders at the bottom of a small hill. Home to many small animals, patches of tall grass and several bushes grow around the stream.  A large willow tree is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: south* west*.
w
>[Cobblestone Lane.]

Adjacent to the street lanterns, two wooden benches lay next to the cobblestone path. A fluttering yellow and orange butterfly flits back and forth amongst large lilac trees displaying their purple hues. A gentle breeze picks up the sweet scent of the purple flowers and carries it across the lane.  A colorful cobblestone path, a glowing tall wrought iron street lantern, a rosewood bench, and a flowering lilac tree are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* east* south*.

go gate
>[Cobblestone Lane.]

Several well placed street lanterns line the well kept cobblestone path. A towering oak tree sits off to the side of the path. Its leaves blow and twist displaying its various mint green colors. Nestled in its branches several blue birds call back and forth to one another in song. Floating grey clouds pass by overhead.  An open large wrought iron gate, a colorful cobblestone path, and a glowing tall wrought iron street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: south* west.
[Shoteron Way.]

A low hedge grows between the Spurian Wall and the street. Flowers bloom on the hedge, and cheer up what might be a dreary view. Two guards lean over the tall wall and call down greetings to those who pass. At any time of the day, one may pass a Fir Elf on the way to market, or a Hithual stumbling home to sleep.  A street lantern and an open large wrought iron gate are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
w
w
>[Shoteron Way.]

A shadowy black twisted free form metal sculpture stands on a small patch of grass at the beginning of Shoteron Way. Its unique design catches the light of both the sun and the moon. Below the memorial are several small items that have been left in passing. The well-manicured cobblestone path shows signs that it is well traveled, with enough room for even the largest cart or Leuian family.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
nw
>[Law Road & Shoteron Way.]

Law Road from the south and Shoteron Way from the east join before turning toward Town Square to the northwest. If one stays at this location long enough, they see the irony of these two roads joining. Most who are escorted south along Law Road are the criminals and ne'er-do-wells of the Spur, while those travel along Shoteron Way are the upper class residents whom live further east. Two office building, the City Planners Office and the Archmage's office stand on opposite sides of the road, each one neatly kept and freshly painted.  A street lantern and an open morbius door are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* south* northwest*.
[Gateway.]

You are just inside the gateway between the Justice District and the Town Square. Most of those heading into the Justice District have a grim look about them. Then again, it could just be the chains. A small sign stands off to the side.  An open iron gate, a street lantern, and a wooden sign are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* south*.
go gate
>[Right Street.]

Right Street ends at a gateway leading to the Housing and Administration District. Those living in this portion of town travel comfortably either by conveyance or by foot. Beautiful flowers grow on both sides of the well tended, freshly painted gate. In front, standing crisply at attention, a Guard tips his hat in greeting to all those who pass.  An open iron gate and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: northwest*.
nw
>[Right Street.]

A large wagon sits on the side of the street, its load having shifted and then toppled over. A Usil driver yells at his two Oog-ra helpers, explaining to them that the armoire should be sitting upright and not on its side. They scratch themselves in confusion, and you can hear them muttering something about leaving it on its side, so it does not fall again. There will be a resident who is unhappy with their purchase this evening.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st city guard archer.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.

nw
nw
>[Right Street.]

A neatly trimmed hedge with a small strip of grass fronts the road that travels between the Spurian Housing District and the center of town. A well dressed Frontacian woman hurries along the path as two immaculately dressed Guards lead a criminal towards the jail. She sniffs in a haughty manner, and tips her hat down so she does not have to view the filth of the city.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.
nw
[Right Street.]

A polished wooden bench sits in front of a neatly trimmed hedge. It is the perfect spot for those who wish to rest and allow their pets or children to play along the grass fronting the roadway. A small stone well complete with a dipper stands ready to slake the thirst of those who travel this way or who need a breather.  A small stone well and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.
[Right Street.]

The road between the center of town and the housing district is well kept and maintained. Ruts are immediately repaired and small bushes and flowers line the way. The class of people that travel this way are better dressed and obviously of a higher class. Occasionally guards can be seen taking criminals towards the jail in an efficient and orderly manner.  A street lantern and a pair of open wide mahogany doors are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.
[Town Square.]

The elegant Hotel Royale towers above the street, its emerald door sparkling in the light. The patrons that stroll in and out are catered to, doors opened and closed for them, and baggage and packages carried by harried servants. The large Bank of Spur sits on the east side of the square. Its location close to the Royale is not a coincidence. A gold-trimmed door is proof of the success of this branch of the Spurian bank and those who run it.  An elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, open emerald steel door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* southeast* west* northwest*.
go door
>[Bank.]

Two large Thugian guards stand sentinel on each side of the doors to the main branch of the Bank of Spur. Elegant furnishings adorn the office. Polished oak and gold filigree emphasize the wealth that abounds in this establishment. Well-dressed tellers stand ready to help you store your money safely or to reduce your coinage to more manageable form.  An open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, a wooden sign, and a bright wooden sign are here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room are Bant the Drake (flying 5 feet above you), Gwen the Secian, Tchori the Leuian, Aliyah the Secian, Verbaniah the Secian (holding a flaming rose petal filled moonsilver censer), and Forsythia the Drake.
Obvious exits: None.

Tchori looks like a 7'6" standard adolescent light boned, muscular bodied Leuian.
He has very long, wild, wispy golden blonde fur with a neatly trimmed beard, triangular golden eyes, and looks neat.
He appears to be happy right now.
He can be attacked by other players.

On his forehead is a tattoo of a Darkstar.

On his right arm is a tattoo which reads "Klayea" written in Leuian, surrounded by the symbol of eternity.

On his left arm a tattoo of an island floating in a sea of stars, with the words "Leuia" written above it.

He appears to be in perfect health.
There is a shining gold emblem affixed to his clothing.

Physical appearance:

Shadowed eyes look back with an expression of both wisdom and confusion

                        Visible Equipment
A mottled sabertooth tiger pelt                    (armor)
A sabertooth tiger skull                           (on head)

An emerald inlaid moonsilver Khat'sara band        (ring (left))

[Right Street.]

Right Street ends at a gateway leading to the Housing and Administration District. Those living in this portion of town travel comfortably either by conveyance or by foot. Beautiful flowers grow on both sides of the well tended, freshly painted gate. In front, standing crisply at attention, a Guard tips his hat in greeting to all those who pass. >[Law Road & Shoteron Way.]

Law Road from the south and Shoteron Way from the east join before turning toward Town Square to the northwest. If one stays at this location long enough, they see the irony of these two roads joining. Most who are escorted south along Law Road are the criminals and ne'er-do-wells of the Spur, while those travel along Shoteron Way are the upper class residents whom live further east. Two office building, the City Planners Office and the Archmage's office stand on opposite sides of the road, each one neatly kept and freshly painted.  A street lantern and an open morbius door are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* south* northwest*.

>[Shoteron Way.]

A shadowy black twisted free form metal sculpture stands on a small patch of grass at the beginning of Shoteron Way. Its unique design catches the light of both the sun and the moon. Below the memorial are several small items that have been left in passing. The well-manicured cobblestone path shows signs that it is well traveled, with enough room for even the largest cart or Leuian family.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.

>[Shoteron Way.]

A low hedge grows between the Spurian Wall and the street. Flowers bloom on the hedge, and cheer up what might be a dreary view. Two guards lean over the tall wall and call down greetings to those who pass. At any time of the day, one may pass a Fir Elf on the way to market, or a Hithual stumbling home to sleep. >[Cobblestone Lane.]

Several well placed street lanterns line the well kept cobblestone path. A towering oak tree sits off to the side of the path. Its leaves blow and twist displaying its various mint green colors. Nestled in its branches several blue birds call back and forth to one another in song. Floating grey clouds pass by overhead. >[Raine Estates.]

Several majestic willow trees, with their long drooping branches, stand at the top of a gently sloping hill. The scent of fresh, green trodden grass, and the gentle rustling of the golden leaves overhead delighted the senses. On the edge of the property, a waterfall trickles over an embankment of several large white stones into a light green pool below. The glistening water travels down a slow moving stream caring fallen leaves and grass.  A glistening stream and a closed vine entwined silver gate are here.

>[Mystical Garden.]

The garden is surrounded by a non-symmetrical stone wall done in earthen shades, yellow roses and wild vines clinging to its stony face. A small mosaic just barely peeking out from the mass of flowers and leaves can be viewed as the sun rises. In the midst of it all, a large willow tree spreads its massive branches over the area, colorful paper lanterns hanging within. A lush blanket of natural carpet, deep green clover spouting from the ground to form a soft pathway. The edge of the pond reaches to the edge of the path, the beginning of a breathtaking garden starting here. In the distance the calls of ducks and other wildlife can be heard. From one of the tallest tree branches, the echoing hum of busy bees sound from a golden beehive, the scent of honey filling the air with a delightful aroma.  An earthen stone wall mosaic and an open vine entwined silver gate are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.

>[Pathway Garden.]

Cheerful laughter can be heard echoing through this open air garden as wisps of bright colors flash past. Secians run and play a game of mid-flight tag, merrily flying past one another as their rainbow wings become a blur. Gray flecked white marble benches line a small, deep blue pool filled with cool, tranquil waters with the exception of a stray duck making a crash-landing. Various sorts of flowers from every imaginable part of Aradath sprout in full bloom in all areas, nearly overtaking the pathway. A red rosebush stands out in particular, well kept, the flowers bloom brilliantly opening to the sun. The scent of delicate floral mixed with fresh grass and tall, green leafed trees makes for an intoxicatingly fresh aroma.  A red rosebush is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.

[Entryway.]

A smooth gray marble floor flecked with white spreads out beneath you. A constant, calming sound of trickling water can be heard from a small matching marble fountain in the center. The fresh water trickles down from the three-tiered fountain spreading over little black and white pebbles in the basin. Pillows of bright colors, large and small, line the corner of the room, providing an inviting place for conversations and relaxation. A winding staircase with a thick wrought iron railing wraps its way upwards, only to grow hazy with wisps of mist as it reaches the ceiling. A few carved marble benches line the fountain for those that wish to sit next to it, the feet of the seating resembling that of a clawed Dragon. Affixed to one of the walls is a small plaque made of a blackened silvery-gray metal.  A blackened silver-trimmed plaque, a tall flowing marble fountain, and a mist covered cobblestone pathway are here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: north* east* south* west*.

[Air.]

Only two walls remain of this once large room. A few stray blades of grass protrude through the stone floor, sprouting between the cracks. You can still make out what was once a glorious mosaic, depicting a fluffy white cloud puffing a breath of swirled white and sapphire wind. A warm breeze flows through the area, and whispers through the four supportive blue sapphire pillars holding aloft a highly polished dome roof. A few cracks in the silver dome allow rays of warm sunlight to enter, creating chaotic patterns on the floor as the sun moves throughout the day. Suddenly a myriad of bubbles surround you, dancing through the air entering from cracks within the wall. The bubbles pop as they touch any furniture or person and vanish from sight. Soft feather stuffed white and blue silk pillows lay in groups around the room, surprisingly untouched from the elements and popping bubbles.  A pile of blue and white feathered pillows is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: west*.

>[Earth.]

Overhead, the canopy of deep green leaves allows for only a little bit of sun to shine through, dappling the area in patches light. The dark brown trees seem ancient and impossibly huge. Vines climb across their branches, connecting each to the next. Lush vegetation grows around their bases; broad leafed ferns, and tropical flowers. A few rare copper tinted flowers sprout near the tallest of the dark trees. Bright jewel colored hummingbirds dart around cheerfully, not seeming to mind any noise or visitors. The roots of the largest tree in the center of the grove form a small depression, filled with the blue green waters accumulated during rainfall. Small stone benches rest in the nooks of the roots around the pool. Copper basins next to them are filled with refreshments.  A majestic willow tree and an ancient tarnished copper basin are here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: east*.

Pillows of bright colors, large and small, line the corner of the room, providing an inviting place for conversations and relaxation. A winding staircase with a thick wrought iron railing wraps its way upwards, only to grow hazy with wisps of mist as it reaches the ceiling. A few carved marble benches line the fountain for those that wish to sit next to it, the feet of the seating resembling that of a clawed Dragon. Affixed to one of the walls is a small plaque made of a blackened silvery-gray metal.  A blackened silver-trimmed plaque, a tall flowing marble fountain, and a mist covered cobblestone pathway are here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: north* east* south* west*.
s
>[Water.]

A highly detailed mural in various shades of turquoise and amethyst depicts the rolling ocean. White sea foam spreads across the edges of the waves into the clear sky of the elaborate wall paintings. The floor is made of a thick glass, underneath a pool of water swirls creating the illusion of being out to sea. A few fan-tailed fish swim through the underground pool and fade away from sight to some unknown area. A gentle breeze blows through the room at sporadic times, refreshing and soothing. Stray patches of white sand litter the floor, leading to their dune piles residing in the corners, creating a comfortable place to sit or build a castle.  A closed amethyst swirled marble chest is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: north*.

>[Entryway.]

A smooth gray marble floor flecked with white spreads out beneath you. A constant, calming sound of trickling water can be heard from a small matching marble fountain in the center. The fresh water trickles down from the three-tiered fountain spreading over little black and white pebbles in the basin. Pillows of bright colors, large and small, line the corner of the room, providing an inviting place for conversations and relaxation. A winding staircase with a thick wrought iron railing wraps its way upwards, only to grow hazy with wisps of mist as it reaches the ceiling. A few carved marble benches line the fountain for those that wish to sit next to it, the feet of the seating resembling that of a clawed Dragon. [Fire.]

Worn stones form the walls and floor of this room; veined in ruby, the stones feel warm on the soles of your feet, glowing with their radiating heat. The air shimmers with the warmth emanating from the center of the area. A huge gold lined pit sits directly in the middle, magical red and amber flames dance within it. Roughly carved wooden logs surround the blaze, allowing one to bask in the warmth of the flames. Shadows dance along the walls, forming the perfect backdrop of mystery. Charred-ended sticks are scattered about, some with the blackened remains of marshmallows and other roasted foods.  Some glowing mystical red swirled amber flames and a golden fire pit are here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: south*.

>[Night.]

Upon entering this pitch black painted circular room it is difficult to find your bearings at first. Much darker in hue than the rest of the areas, the decor has been styled to represent a midnight sky.  An ebony archway barely visible rests on the far wall, magick surrounding it, preventing visibility into the area on the other side. Astonishing platinum stars inlaid into the ceiling flicker in the low pillar candle light.  Magickal platinum flamed candles made of deep black beeswax rest upon small round ebony tables.  Light fluffy pillows shaped to resemble clouds are stacked in three corners, dark blue and indigo in shade.  A few warm fleece blankets are stacked upon a black marble shelf carved into the wall, allowing visitors to keep warm even on the coldest of nights.  A winding wrought iron railed staircase, a closed smooth black marble box dotted with stars, and a smooth ebony archway are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: None.

[Day.]

Bright light fills this room at all times of day, reminding of pure, natural sunlight.  The rays of illumination have a brassy tint to them, creating a warm hued glow upon the simple furniture of this open-air room. Only one wall stands here, a divider to some unseen area; covered in brilliant emerald vines, splitting and taking over through cracks and niches. A single dark green vine appears sturdy enough to climb. A handmade bronze sun rests upon the wall, attached at the rough hammered points, only barely visible through the vines. Furniture built of bronze and brass center around a small pond within the center of the room. Hardly deep, a few metallic-hued fish can be seen through the emerald greenish mossy waters. When night turns to day, the bronze sun glows momentarily as a pale blue mist comes from within it, creating a magickal faux sky overhead resembling that of noon time; slowly it fades away as the day truly changes and the stars outside fade from few.  A deep crack in the wall and a smooth ebony archway are here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: None.

>[Bond Garden.]

Mysterious mists form the barrier around this strange garden. Nothing can be seen of the route you took to get here. Giant sized flowers bloom all around you, each one a different color and shade. A lush carpet of jewel green grass cushions your feet. The call of exotic birds echo through the air. Breaking through the path of flowers you come upon a small clump of peach trees. Luscious fruits hang from their drooping branches. Some have already been plucked and placed in a large straw basket. At the center of the stand of trees is spread a large quilted blanket. Upon closer examination of the quilt you notice each square shows a different stage of being in the life of a dragon. Quiet descends around you, filling the area with a sense of peace.  A long vine, an open deep ribboned picnic basket, and a large multicolored quilted blanket are here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious exits: None.

[Pathway Garden.]

Cheerful laughter can be heard echoing through this open air garden as wisps of bright colors flash past. Secians run and play a game of mid-flight tag, merrily flying past one another as their rainbow wings become a blur. Gray flecked white marble benches line a small, deep blue pool filled with cool, tranquil waters with the exception of a stray duck making a crash-landing. Various sorts of flowers from every imaginable part of Aradath sprout in full bloom in all areas, nearly overtaking the pathway. A red rosebush stands out in particular, well kept, the flowers bloom brilliantly opening to the sun. The scent of delicate floral mixed with fresh grass and tall, green leafed trees makes for an intoxicatingly fresh aroma.  A red rosebush and a mist covered cobblestone pathway are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: north.

[Mystical Garden.]

The garden is surrounded by a non-symmetrical stone wall done in earthen shades, yellow roses and wild vines clinging to its stony face. A small mosaic just barely peeking out from the mass of flowers and leaves can be viewed as the sun rises. In the midst of it all, a large willow tree spreads its massive branches over the area, colorful paper lanterns hanging within. A lush blanket of natural carpet, deep green clover spouting from the ground to form a soft pathway. The edge of the pond reaches to the edge of the path, the beginning of a breathtaking garden starting here. In the distance the calls of ducks and other wildlife can be heard. From one of the tallest tree branches, the echoing hum of busy bees sound from a golden beehive, the scent of honey filling the air with a delightful aroma.  An earthen stone wall mosaic and a closed vine entwined silver gate are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: south*.

Glinka says, " you got a good memry"

A flaming wrought iron oil lantern, a glowing moonsilver arch, and a mailbox are here.

[Willow Hill.]

Several majestic weeping willow trees, with long drooping branches, stand about a well-kept gravel pathway. A slight wind blows among the trees and tall grass which grows around the path which leads to the west and to the south. A tall, sturdy wrought iron fence stands to the east, entwined so thickly with ivy and other creeping vines that the fence itself is hardly visible at all. Short stone posts topped with slightly glowing blue orbs stand on either side of the pathway every few yards, providing enough illumination to see by at night.  A majestic weeping willow tree and a gap through the leaves are here.

[Cobblestone Lane.]

Several well placed street lanterns line the well kept cobblestone path. A towering oak tree sits off to the side of the path. Its leaves blow and twist displaying its various mint green colors. Nestled in its branches several blue birds call back and forth to one another in song. Floating grey clouds pass by overhead.  A colorful cobblestone path and a glowing tall wrought iron street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: north* east* south*.

[Cobblestone Lane.]

An ivy-covered wrought iron fence lines the cobblestone path to the west. Intricately sculpted hedges and elegant flower arrangements adorn the lawn behind it. Ivy has crept over to the street lanterns and entwined their way to the top. An enchanting landscape of lush green fields, adorned with vibrant flowers and trees can be seen in both directions. [Cobblestone Lane.]

Several well placed street lanterns line the well kept cobblestone path. A towering oak tree sits off to the side of the path. Its leaves blow and twist displaying its various mint green colors. Nestled in its branches several blue birds call back and forth to one another in song. Floating grey clouds pass by overhead. Aliyah nods.

You follow Aliyah through an open large wrought iron gate...

[Shoteron Way.]

A low hedge grows between the Spurian Wall and the street. Flowers bloom on the hedge, and cheer up what might be a dreary view. Two guards lean over the tall wall and call down greetings to those who pass. At any time of the day, one may pass a Fir Elf on the way to market, or a Hithual stumbling home to sleep.  A street lantern and an open large wrought iron gate are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Aliyah west...

[Shoteron Way.]

A shadowy black twisted free form metal sculpture stands on a small patch of grass at the beginning of Shoteron Way. Its unique design catches the light of both the sun and the moon. Below the memorial are several small items that have been left in passing. The well-manicured cobblestone path shows signs that it is well traveled, with enough room for even the largest cart or Leuian family.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Aliyah west...

[Law Road & Shoteron Way.]

Law Road from the south and Shoteron Way from the east join before turning toward Town Square to the northwest. If one stays at this location long enough, they see the irony of these two roads joining. Most who are escorted south along Law Road are the criminals and ne'er-do-wells of the Spur, while those travel along Shoteron Way are the upper class residents whom live further east. Two office building, the City Planners Office and the Archmage's office stand on opposite sides of the road, each one neatly kept and freshly painted.  A street lantern and an open morbius door are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* south* northwest*.

[Gateway.]

You are just inside the gateway between the Justice District and the Town Square. Most of those heading into the Justice District have a grim look about them. Then again, it could just be the chains. A small sign stands off to the side.  An open iron gate, a street lantern, and a wooden sign are here.

[Right Street.]

Right Street ends at a gateway leading to the Housing and Administration District. Those living in this portion of town travel comfortably either by conveyance or by foot. Beautiful flowers grow on both sides of the well tended, freshly painted gate. In front, standing crisply at attention, a Guard tips his hat in greeting to all those who pass.  An open iron gate and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: northwest*.

You follow Aliyah northwest...

[Right Street.]

A large wagon sits on the side of the street, its load having shifted and then toppled over. A Usil driver yells at his two Oog-ra helpers, explaining to them that the armoire should be sitting upright and not on its side. They scratch themselves in confusion, and you can hear them muttering something about leaving it on its side, so it does not fall again. There will be a resident who is unhappy with their purchase this evening.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.

You follow Aliyah northwest...

[Right Street.]

A neatly trimmed hedge with a small strip of grass fronts the road that travels between the Spurian Housing District and the center of town. A well dressed Frontacian woman hurries along the path as two immaculately dressed Guards lead a criminal towards the jail. She sniffs in a haughty manner, and tips her hat down so she does not have to view the filth of the city.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.

You follow Aliyah northwest...

[Right Street.]

A polished wooden bench sits in front of a neatly trimmed hedge. It is the perfect spot for those who wish to rest and allow their pets or children to play along the grass fronting the roadway. A small stone well complete with a dipper stands ready to slake the thirst of those who travel this way or who need a breather.  A small stone well and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.

You follow Aliyah northwest...

[Right Street.]

The road between the center of town and the housing district is well kept and maintained. Ruts are immediately repaired and small bushes and flowers line the way. The class of people that travel this way are better dressed and obviously of a higher class. Occasionally guards can be seen taking criminals towards the jail in an efficient and orderly manner.  A street lantern and a pair of open wide mahogany doors are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.

You follow Aliyah northwest...

[Town Square.]

The elegant Hotel Royale towers above the street, its emerald door sparkling in the light. The patrons that stroll in and out are catered to, doors opened and closed for them, and baggage and packages carried by harried servants. The large Bank of Spur sits on the east side of the square. Its location close to the Royale is not a coincidence. A gold-trimmed door is proof of the success of this branch of the Spurian bank and those who run it.  An elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, open emerald steel door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: north* southeast* west* northwest*.

You follow Aliyah northwest...

[Town Square Center.]

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. High above the square, the wings of two imperial stone dragons form an arch for a massive gateway. The colossal monument stands at the heart of the city like a silent sentinel keeping watch over the entire realm. Lifelike marble statues decorate the square's perimeter, each a celebrated hero of Spur's past.   A flowing white marble fountain, some crystal flecked granite oliphant-shaped benches, a cracked marble statue of a Human, a carved marble statue of a Dragon, a rosewood sign, some flaming ruby ashes, and a deep fluffy snow drift are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Ronan the Hithual and Aliyah the Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

[Town Square South.]

The outward appearance of the people here seems a bit classier. Rich clothing and large coin purses are prevalent amongst the travelers. In fact, many of the folk heading into Town Square from the south are accompanied by large bodyguards to assure their safety. The well maintained road is lined with small brass lanterns, each swinging off an individual pole. No expense has been spared to keep those who travel this road safe from the hoodlums that relish the darkness.  A street lantern and some charred foliage are here.

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. High above the square, the wings of two imperial stone dragons form an arch for a massive gateway. The colossal monument stands at the heart of the city like a silent sentinel keeping watch over the entire realm. Lifelike marble statues decorate the square's perimeter, each a celebrated hero of Spur's past.   A flowing white marble fountain, some crystal flecked granite oliphant-shaped benches, a cracked marble statue of a Human, a carved marble statue of a Dragon, a rosewood sign, some flaming ruby ashes, and a deep fluffy snow drift are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st battle cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Wintersbreeze the San Elf, Ronan the Hithual, and Kayin the Human.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

Kayin's group just went west.

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. se
[Town Square.]

The elegant Hotel Royale towers above the street, its emerald door sparkling in the light. The patrons that stroll in and out are catered to, doors opened and closed for them, and baggage and packages carried by harried servants. The large Bank of Spur sits on the east side of the square. Its location close to the Royale is not a coincidence. A gold-trimmed door is proof of the success of this branch of the Spurian bank and those who run it.  An elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, open emerald steel door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* southeast* west* northwest*.
go door
>[Bank.]

Two large Thugian guards stand sentinel on each side of the doors to the main branch of the Bank of Spur. Elegant furnishings adorn the office. Polished oak and gold filigree emphasize the wealth that abounds in this establishment. Well-dressed tellers stand ready to help you store your money safely or to reduce your coinage to more manageable form.  An open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, a wooden sign, and a bright wooden sign are here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: None.

>[Town Square Center.]

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. w
>[Town Square West.]

People carrying bundles stream in from the west and rapidly lose themselves in the large crowds moving about in the vast town square. Several citizens head west with bulging coinpurses babbling excitedly about what they're going to purchase. Giggling children dart around the slower moving folks rushing on their way to spend the silvers in their pockets.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* west*.
w
w
>[Merchant Walk.]

Neatly trimmed shrubbery line well-maintained cobblestones along Merchant Walk. Apprentices rush by carrying supplies and orders, carrying out their masters' business. Several wooden benches line the walk for those customers who need to rest from the strain of carrying heavy parcels.  A street lantern is here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: east* west*.
w
w
>[Merchant Walk.]

A neatly kept park fronts this portion of Merchant Walk. Topiary and low shrubberies partition off small sections of the park. Young lovers sit on benches almost hidden from view, gazing at each other with looks of love, oblivious to the continual bustle of passing customers and merchants on their way to do business.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
[Merchant Walk.]

Merchants, some in frilly finery, others dressed in homespun wools, travel back and forth along this street on their way to and from work. They seem to blend together here, if only briefly. Several of the more haughty looking merchants are trailed by overloaded carts pushed along by haggard young apprentices.   A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
[Merchant Walk.]

Several city guardsmen have just finished wrestling to the ground some young tough thieves, who thought to rob one of the returning merchants. To one side a relieved-looking Fir Elf gentleman holds on tightly to his gold-tipped walking stick, as the human boy yells his innocence to any who might listen. His pleas fall on deaf ears as the guards drag him away.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
w
>[Merchant Walk.]

Merchant Walk comes to an abrupt end at a massive moonsilver gate. The towering walls of Spur on either side of the gates force all to pass by the guards who are constantly on the watch for thieves and bandits. Just beyond the gates one can glimpse the bustling Merchant District of Spur.  A gilded oak sign and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east*.
go gate
>[Trade Way.]

A large gate separates the Merchant District and Town Square-the hub of Spur's activity. The partially opened gate is currently able to accommodate the simultaneous passage of several locals and visitors, but can be expanded to accept carriages, or sealed to ward against invasion.  Guards stand sentry from atop the wall as well as the ground.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: west*.
w
>[Trade Way.]

Many townsfolk pass along this busy thoroughfare. Rich and poor alike mix freely on this street, much to the dismay of a passing nobleman. A young human struggles with an armful of packages and two young children in tow. Those in need of goods or supplies head west towards the market, those looking for the news of the day head east towards Town Square.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

[Trade Way & Bazaar Path.]

A path to the north winds its way among various stalls and tents. Some specialty outlets can be found, provided one does not get lost in this maze known as the Bazaar. More permanent structures to the south suggest finer goods as well as increased security.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* east* west*.
[Trade Way.]

This well-worn road separates the Bazaar to the north and Market Circle to the south. Only a Thugian could appreciate the layered odors of simmering foodstuffs and shoppers from the Bazaar. Crowds of people push past, some brushing against you. It might be a good idea to keep an eye on your coinpurse.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st loitering bum.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
[Trade & Market.]

The buildings of Market Circle stand to the south. It becomes obvious that the area through the arch is a much cleaner marketplace than the bazaar. An inviting eatery stands beside the road, its door open to those weary after a long trip to Spur, as well as those preparing to venture to the great expanses beyond the west gate. A human couple exit the building, arm in arm. A small sign stands beside the intersection.  A sign, an open glossy lacquered oak door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* south* west*.

>[Market Street.]

Situated between the well-traveled Trade Way to the north and the fine shops of Market Circle to the south, this small stretch of road is busy at all times of day. Adventurers with sacks of plundered goods leave Market Street and head west. A shrewd businessman has set up shop in this busy area of the Market District.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* south* west*.

go door
>[Side Street.]

A new building has been erected on this side street. It is sturdily constructed from wood and brick, and bears a sign reading, "Symher's Trading Post." Various objects line the window display ranging from weapons and armor to random objects you've never seen before. Insistent bartering goes on at all hours.  A pair of open double applewood doors and a street lantern are here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: east*.
>[Spurian Trading Post.]

Symher the Usil Trader sits in a corner with a small lamp cataloging and appraising the various items he has deemed fit to buy.  The cluttered shelves are piled so high it's a wonder he can keep track.  You carefully make your way through the armor, weapons and assorted sundries, to the counter.  A pair of open double applewood doors are here.

This room is illuminated.

>[Market Street.]

Situated between the well-traveled Trade Way to the north and the fine shops of Market Circle to the south, this small stretch of road is busy at all times of day. Adventurers with sacks of plundered goods leave Market Street and head west. A shrewd businessman has set up shop in this busy area of the Market District.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* south* west*.
s
>[Market Street.]

Market Street ends here at a large archway. People bustle in and out of the arch, some without so much as a nod. The city wall rises up to the south and west of the buildings of Market Circle. A small sign is posted on the wall beside the archway.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north*.
go ar
go door
>[Market Circle.]

An arch between two large buildings connects Market Circle and Market Street. The more reputable shopkeepers do business within the circle, but pay higher taxes for the privilege. The buildings have been built to last, as these merchants are no traveling tinkers. Interlocking stone walkways and colorful plantings span this central area. Despite the number of animals waiting outside the bank for their owners, the area is spotless. Loud chatter in many languages can be heard from the southwest.  A marble archway, an open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, and a wooden sign are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st city guard mage.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.
[Bank.]

The quiet hum of business fills your ears as you enter the Market Circle branch of the Rasnian Bank.  A long wooden desk at the far end of the room contains many tellers waiting to help you with your banking needs.  An open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door and a bright wooden sign are here.

This room is illuminated.
You see the 1st governor's dread knight.
Obvious exits: None.

[Market Circle.]

An arch between two large buildings connects Market Circle and Market Street. The more reputable shopkeepers do business within the circle, but pay higher taxes for the privilege. The buildings have been built to last, as these merchants are no traveling tinkers. Interlocking stone walkways and colorful plantings span this central area. Despite the number of animals waiting outside the bank for their owners, the area is spotless. Loud chatter in many languages can be heard from the southwest.  A marble archway, an open elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, and a wooden sign are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st city guard mage.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

>[Market Street.]

Situated between the well-traveled Trade Way to the north and the fine shops of Market Circle to the south, this small stretch of road is busy at all times of day. Adventurers with sacks of plundered goods leave Market Street and head west. A shrewd businessman has set up shop in this busy area of the Market District.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* south* west*.
[Trade & Market.]

The buildings of Market Circle stand to the south. It becomes obvious that the area through the arch is a much cleaner marketplace than the bazaar. An inviting eatery stands beside the road, its door open to those weary after a long trip to Spur, as well as those preparing to venture to the great expanses beyond the west gate. A human couple exit the building, arm in arm. A small sign stands beside the intersection.  A sign, an open glossy lacquered oak door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* south* west*.
e
e
e
e
>[Trade Way.]

This well-worn road separates the Bazaar to the north and Market Circle to the south. Only a Thugian could appreciate the layered odors of simmering foodstuffs and shoppers from the Bazaar. Crowds of people push past, some brushing against you. It might be a good idea to keep an eye on your coinpurse.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
[Trade Way & Bazaar Path.]

A path to the north winds its way among various stalls and tents. Some specialty outlets can be found, provided one does not get lost in this maze known as the Bazaar. More permanent structures to the south suggest finer goods as well as increased security.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* east* west*.
[Trade Way.]

Many townsfolk pass along this busy thoroughfare. Rich and poor alike mix freely on this street, much to the dismay of a passing nobleman. A young human struggles with an armful of packages and two young children in tow. Those in need of goods or supplies head west towards the market, those looking for the news of the day head east towards Town Square.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
[Trade Way.]

A large gate separates the Merchant District and Town Square-the hub of Spur's activity. The partially opened gate is currently able to accommodate the simultaneous passage of several locals and visitors, but can be expanded to accept carriages, or sealed to ward against invasion.  Guards stand sentry from atop the wall as well as the ground.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: west*.
go gate
e
>[Merchant Walk.]

Merchant Walk comes to an abrupt end at a massive moonsilver gate. The towering walls of Spur on either side of the gates force all to pass by the guards who are constantly on the watch for thieves and bandits. Just beyond the gates one can glimpse the bustling Merchant District of Spur.  A gilded oak sign and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east*.
e
e
e
>[Merchant Walk.]

Several city guardsmen have just finished wrestling to the ground some young tough thieves, who thought to rob one of the returning merchants. To one side a relieved-looking Fir Elf gentleman holds on tightly to his gold-tipped walking stick, as the human boy yells his innocence to any who might listen. His pleas fall on deaf ears as the guards drag him away.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st dog.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
e
e
[Merchant Walk.]

Merchants, some in frilly finery, others dressed in homespun wools, travel back and forth along this street on their way to and from work. They seem to blend together here, if only briefly. Several of the more haughty looking merchants are trailed by overloaded carts pushed along by haggard young apprentices.   A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
[Merchant Walk.]

A neatly kept park fronts this portion of Merchant Walk. Topiary and low shrubberies partition off small sections of the park. Young lovers sit on benches almost hidden from view, gazing at each other with looks of love, oblivious to the continual bustle of passing customers and merchants on their way to do business.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
[Merchant Walk.]

Neatly trimmed shrubbery line well-maintained cobblestones along Merchant Walk. Apprentices rush by carrying supplies and orders, carrying out their masters' business. Several wooden benches line the walk for those customers who need to rest from the strain of carrying heavy parcels.  A street lantern is here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: east* west*.
[Town Square West.]

People carrying bundles stream in from the west and rapidly lose themselves in the large crowds moving about in the vast town square. Several citizens head west with bulging coinpurses babbling excitedly about what they're going to purchase. Giggling children dart around the slower moving folks rushing on their way to spend the silvers in their pockets.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* west*.
[Town Square Center.]

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. High above the square, the wings of two imperial stone dragons form an arch for a massive gateway. The colossal monument stands at the heart of the city like a silent sentinel keeping watch over the entire realm. Lifelike marble statues decorate the square's perimeter, each a celebrated hero of Spur's past.   A flowing white marble fountain, some crystal flecked granite oliphant-shaped benches, a cracked marble statue of a Human, a carved marble statue of a Dragon, a rosewood sign, some flaming ruby ashes, and a deep fluffy snow drift are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Kiralyn the Secian, Bant the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, Raptorian the Noble Secian, Caylith the Drake, Silvermane the Human, Blanche the Noble Oog-ra, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

[Town Square South.]

The outward appearance of the people here seems a bit classier. Rich clothing and large coin purses are prevalent amongst the travelers. In fact, many of the folk heading into Town Square from the south are accompanied by large bodyguards to assure their safety. The well maintained road is lined with small brass lanterns, each swinging off an individual pole. No expense has been spared to keep those who travel this road safe from the hoodlums that relish the darkness.  A street lantern and some charred foliage are here.

[Knowledge Path.]

Before you stands a magnificent white marble temple dedicated to Odarous, the god of chivalry. Ten giant steps made of the same gleaming marble lead up to the temple entrance. Two large statues stand at the base of the stairs, also carved of breath-taking marble. One is a warrior bearing a massive sword and a large shield. The other is a cleric with an amulet bearing the mark of Odarous in one hand and a large mace in the other. [Knowledge Path.]

Knowledge Path heads out of the bustling Town Square and moves southwest towards the District of Magick and Rehas Way. Mixed with the robed mages that move southwest are merchants, customers and thieves alike. Moving quickly, especially with a full purse, is your best bet along this path. Several members of the various mage orders of Spur and well-dressed shoppers seeking rarities travel along Knowledge's Path to and from the District of Magick. The district is the place to find the most talented artisans and craftiest merchants in Spur. It is also home to the mages of the non-elemental order.  A street lantern is here.

[Magick Lane.]

A massive circular stone platform stands to the side of Magick Lane, strangely entrancing runes carved on every inch of its sides. l in doo
[Mage Training.]

A large room is filled with young magi trying frantically to take control of their runes. A young water mage apologizes profusely to the older fire mage who had a nice spell going, up until the backfire of water put it out. Instructors shake their head and attempt to put aright any mistakes. Singe spots, puddles, strange piles of rocks and dirt, and uncontrolled winds all mix in an eclectic mess, but those learning would have it no other way. When all the elements come together there is a strength that is unmistakable.  Some open rune-etched wooden doors are here.

This room is illuminated.
Obvious exits: north* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

[Air Conference Room.]

Unseen winds buffet this small room. Currents blowing from seemingly nowhere, hold up a large white table in the center of the room. Several smaller, white circular, seats are likewise floating with no visible means of support. Blue walls, clouds floating across them, like the afternoon sky surround the room. High on the ceiling a flock of birds fly over. While inside the magicks of this room give the illusion of a soft spring day. Wispy white curtains hide the busy blue robed mages who scurry around behind them, gathering items to help out the masters of the winds.

This room is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the room are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Bant the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious exits: southeast*.

Jessia beams at Emberlyn.

[Magick Lane.]

A low slung building resides on the west side of the street. Chanting can be heard from within.  Occasionally a few sparks rise into the sky, or some unwarranted raindrops begin, but they quickly are quelled. A large pair of wooden doors, their surface carved with rune symbols grace the entrance.  A street lantern and some open rune-etched wooden doors are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Magick Lane.]

A squat ugly little shack stands somber on the eastern side of this well swept lane. A mysterious gothic structure rises from what was once scattered remains of an alchemy shop. A multi-colored stained glass window peers watchful from the crafty western building.  A rotting oak sign, a closed ugly rotting door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Bant the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

You follow Kiralyn south...

[Magick Lane.]

A small sign hangs from above the door of the well-kept store before you, telling you that it is a rune shop. The occasional bright flash of light from inside the store suggests all kinds of strange and rare magicks are being cast inside! Those who walk past you glance at the rune shop warily and hurry to get past it as quickly as possible. A small sign hangs from the doorknob of the store that reads "Flerians not allowed!"  An intricately carved oak door and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Bant the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

[Ragarn's Runes.]

Incredible images cover every free corner of this small store, pictures of every possible rune available for purchase hang from the ceiling, on the walls and some even sit on the floor. Drawn onto scrolls, carved into the wood finish of the building or crafted from any number of other materials, each of the different runes has its own strange feeling of excitement to it. The shop owner looks to know what every one of the runes does.  A large glowing sign, a wooden sign, an intricately carved oak door, and some flaming ruby ashes are here.

This room is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the room are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Bant the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious exits: None.

The heal rune has been renewed as requested.

>[Ragarn's Runes.]

Incredible images cover every free corner of this small store, pictures of every possible rune available for purchase hang from the ceiling, on the walls and some even sit on the floor. Drawn onto scrolls, carved into the wood finish of the building or crafted from any number of other materials, each of the different runes has its own strange feeling of excitement to it. The shop owner looks to know what every one of the runes does.  A large glowing sign, a wooden sign, an intricately carved oak door, and some flaming ruby ashes are here.

This room is illuminated.

[Magick Lane.]

A small sign hangs from above the door of the well-kept store before you, telling you that it is a rune shop. The occasional bright flash of light from inside the store suggests all kinds of strange and rare magicks are being cast inside! Those who walk past you glance at the rune shop warily and hurry to get past it as quickly as possible. A small sign hangs from the doorknob of the store that reads "Flerians not allowed!"  An intricately carved oak door and a street lantern are here.

[Magick Lane.]

A massive circular stone platform stands to the side of Magick Lane, strangely entrancing runes carved on every inch of its sides. The symbol of the god Sa, a golden Dragon, fills the space along the top. Raw power and magick seem to flow from the platform, making the air around it crackle with energy. [Rehas Way.]

Named after the first merchant to travel to Spur and set up shop, this road is now home to many of the Spur's finest merchants. [Rehas Way.]

[Rehas Way.]

The old temple that was here has been refurbished and now has a broad banner exclaiming "Gruggle's Emporium!"  Blue and red streamers cascade down from the pillars and a broad red carpet covers the steps of the building. Strange noises emanate from the interior of Gruggle's place. His ability to capture and tame even the most wild of animals is world renowned. The fact that many give wide berth around his doorway convinces any casual observer that Spurians are still not very confident in his capabilities.  A giant wooden arch and a street lantern are here.

[Rehas Way.]

A long-bearded Hithual carefully directs an eclectic group of workers in the building of a new shop. His calm voice points out those errors that would keep this building from being up to his high standards. Quality must be assured by this stout architect. The workers each take turns sitting beneath a large oak tree, a welcome relief from their hard work. A small sign next to the door proudly proclaims, "Pierini's Gems".  A beautiful large oak tree, a street lantern, and an open lacquered silver maple door are here.

[Rehas Way.]

The sweet melody of a stringed instrument floats out the open window of the sturdy building on the southern side of Rehas Way. [Rehas Way.]

Built as a "home away from home," this building is an outlet of the famous Sigrid's Place in Saldaea. The small yard in front has carefully trimmed grass, surrounded by a low hedge. Small stepping stones bisect the yard leading you to a grand door bearing the signature "Crossed Swords." Traffic is heavy along this portion of Rehas Way. Even though it is a rare occurrence to find Sigrid or her Uncle Reyranald in attendance, when they are the line can quickly build around the block for a chance to purchase a weapon from them.  An open green steelwood door and a street lantern are here.

[Rehas Way.]

City guards lean over the walls above watching all who pass into the area. Some are stationed to help protect the interests of the traveling merchants, others to keep an eye on rogues. A large open area stands between the western Spurian Wall and Milene's Outpost. Deep ruts mar the ground, made from the traveling merchant wagons that are known to frequent this area. Whether they park for the evening or for a week, their goods are highly sought after. [Wall Road.]

Shadowed by the wall that surrounds the city, this dark corner sees little traffic. Most Spurians access Rehas Way from Town Square, rather than through this arch. [Wall Road.]

Livestock pace nervously in an enclosure beside the road. Chickens and other fowl peck at the ground in a vain attempt to find some food. A large sow wallows in the mud at the back of the pen, adding to the smell. A few sheep are being herded towards the gate, unaware of the fate that awaits them.  A gateway is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

You follow Kiralyn north...

[Wall Road.]

Wall road is rife with hoofprints and tracks from wagon wheels leading to a large enclosure to the south. To those with two legs, the footing is somewhat difficult. The rear entrances to the stores of Market Circle stand just east of the road, allowing the delivery of goods. Guards peer down from above as farmers herd animals to market.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

Jessia smiles.

You follow Kiralyn north...

[Wall road.]

Huge blocks make up the massive wall beside you. This structure is Spur's number one defense against attack. Rising above the treetops of the woods beyond, it allows the guards to see far into the distance.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious paths: north* south*.

You follow Kiralyn north...

[Gateway.]

The relative safety inside Spur is a comfort to those returning from the fields and mountains. To those leaving, a massive wall of defense around the city lies ahead. Archer towers beside the gate overlook the wall, offering a painful welcome to would-be invaders. Several guards on foot patrol pass and disappear behind a thick, bluesteel banded steelwood door. Wall road stretches to the south, a wide passage between the city wall and several large buildings.  An open iron gate, an open thick stone door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st eagle (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Kiralyn the Secian, Caylith the Drake, Jessia the Novice Secian, and Emberlyn the Novice Secian.
Obvious paths: east* south*.
