[Trade & Market.]

The buildings of Market Circle stand to the south. It becomes obvious that the area through the arch is a much cleaner marketplace than the bazaar. An inviting eatery stands beside the road, its door open to those weary after a long trip to Spur, as well as those preparing to venture to the great expanses beyond the west gate. A human couple exit the building, arm in arm. A small sign stands beside the intersection.  A sign, an open glossy lacquered oak door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* south* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Trade Way.]

This well-worn road separates the Bazaar to the north and Market Circle to the south. Only a Thugian could appreciate the layered odors of simmering foodstuffs and shoppers from the Bazaar. Crowds of people push past, some brushing against you. It might be a good idea to keep an eye on your coinpurse.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Trade Way & Bazaar Path.]

A path to the north winds its way among various stalls and tents. Some specialty outlets can be found, provided one does not get lost in this maze known as the Bazaar. More permanent structures to the south suggest finer goods as well as increased security.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: north* east* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Trade Way.]

Many townsfolk pass along this busy thoroughfare. Rich and poor alike mix freely on this street, much to the dismay of a passing nobleman. A young human struggles with an armful of packages and two young children in tow. Those in need of goods or supplies head west towards the market, those looking for the news of the day head east towards Town Square.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Trade Way.]

A large gate separates the Merchant District and Town Square-the hub of Spur's activity. The partially opened gate is currently able to accommodate the simultaneous passage of several locals and visitors, but can be expanded to accept carriages, or sealed to ward against invasion.  Guards stand sentry from atop the wall as well as the ground.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: west*.

You follow Zackie through an open stone gate...

[Merchant Walk.]

Merchant Walk comes to an abrupt end at a massive moonsilver gate. The towering walls of Spur on either side of the gates force all to pass by the guards who are constantly on the watch for thieves and bandits. Just beyond the gates one can glimpse the bustling Merchant District of Spur.  A gilded oak sign and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st wealthy human noblewoman.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: east*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Merchant Walk.]

Several city guardsmen have just finished wrestling to the ground some young tough thieves, who thought to rob one of the returning merchants. To one side a relieved-looking Fir Elf gentleman holds on tightly to his gold-tipped walking stick, as the human boy yells his innocence to any who might listen. His pleas fall on deaf ears as the guards drag him away.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Merchant Walk.]

Merchants, some in frilly finery, others dressed in homespun wools, travel back and forth along this street on their way to and from work. They seem to blend together here, if only briefly. Several of the more haughty looking merchants are trailed by overloaded carts pushed along by haggard young apprentices.   A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Merchant Walk.]

A neatly kept park fronts this portion of Merchant Walk. Topiary and low shrubberies partition off small sections of the park. Young lovers sit on benches almost hidden from view, gazing at each other with looks of love, oblivious to the continual bustle of passing customers and merchants on their way to do business.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Merchant Walk.]

Neatly trimmed shrubbery line well-maintained cobblestones along Merchant Walk. Apprentices rush by carrying supplies and orders, carrying out their masters' business. Several wooden benches line the walk for those customers who need to rest from the strain of carrying heavy parcels.  A street lantern is here.

This room is illuminated.
In the room is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious exits: east* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Town Square West.]

People carrying bundles stream in from the west and rapidly lose themselves in the large crowds moving about in the vast town square. Several citizens head west with bulging coinpurses babbling excitedly about what they're going to purchase. Giggling children dart around the slower moving folks rushing on their way to spend the silvers in their pockets.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st anthian bard.
In the area is Zackie the Secian.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* west*.

You follow Zackie east...

[Town Square Center.]

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. High above the square, the wings of two imperial stone dragons form an arch for a massive gateway. The colossal monument stands at the heart of the city like a silent sentinel keeping watch over the entire realm. Lifelike marble statues decorate the square's perimeter, each a celebrated hero of Spur's past.   A flowing white marble fountain, some crystal flecked granite oliphant-shaped benches, a cracked marble statue of a Human, a carved marble statue of a Dragon, a rosewood sign, some flaming ruby ashes, a deep fluffy snow drift, and a worn leather money belt are here.

This area is illuminated.
In the area are Stanrar the Noble Human, Oake the Noble Secian (lying down), Bant the Drake, Zackie the Secian, Kalessin the Noble Drake, Tchori the Leuian, Cappy the Noble Secian, Vegan the Noble Go-blin-al, and Kagee the Noble San Elf.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

[Town Square Center.]

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. High above the square, the wings of two imperial stone dragons form an arch for a massive gateway. The colossal monument stands at the heart of the city like a silent sentinel keeping watch over the entire realm. Lifelike marble statues decorate the square's perimeter, each a celebrated hero of Spur's past.   A flowing white marble fountain, some crystal flecked granite oliphant-shaped benches, a cracked marble statue of a Human, a carved marble statue of a Dragon, a rosewood sign, some flaming ruby ashes, a deep fluffy snow drift, and a worn leather money belt are here.

This area is illuminated.

Castin looks like a 5'0" standard adolescent light boned, muscular bodied Anthian Forester.
He has shoulder length, unbridled, fine platinum blonde hair, with reddish brown eyes, and looks casual.
He appears to be sleepy right now.
He bears the mark of Elindale.
He can be attacked by other players.

On his back is a pair of blazing burnt sienna wings that blend into ivory white tips.

On his right shoulder is a tattoo a vine covered tome of Elindale.

On his left calf is a tribal vine tattoo.

He appears to be in perfect health.

Physical appearance:

->>-------------<>

                        Visible Equipment
A blackened serrated mantis blade                  (right hand)
A damaged bone studded bearskin pelt               (armor)
A pointed green feathered hat                      (on head)
A strand of razor sharp shark teeth                (around neck)
A pair of ivy embossed leather gloves              (over hands)
A pair of pointed forest green shoes               (on feet)
A twinkling green diamond band of luck             (ring (right))
An oak ring of Elindale                            (ring (right))
Some green and white drawstring swimming trunks    (pants)

He has been bestowed the following title(s):
  Noble of the Realm

[Town Square.]

The elegant Hotel Royale towers above the street, its emerald door sparkling in the light. The patrons that stroll in and out are catered to, doors opened and closed for them, and baggage and packages carried by harried servants. The large Bank of Spur sits on the east side of the square. Its location close to the Royale is not a coincidence. A gold-trimmed door is proof of the success of this branch of the Spurian bank and those who run it.  An elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, open emerald steel door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st city guard archer, the 2nd city guard archer, the 3rd city guard archer, the 4th city guard archer, the 5th city guard archer, the 6th city guard archer, the 7th city guard archer, the 8th city guard archer, the 9th city guard archer, the 10th city guard archer, and the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area is Castin the Anthian.
Obvious paths: north* southeast* west* northwest*.

>
You follow Castin southeast...

[Right Street.]

The road between the center of town and the housing district is well kept and maintained. Ruts are immediately repaired and small bushes and flowers line the way. The class of people that travel this way are better dressed and obviously of a higher class. Occasionally guards can be seen taking criminals towards the jail in an efficient and orderly manner.  A street lantern and a pair of open wide mahogany doors are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area is Castin the Anthian.

[Right Street.]

A polished wooden bench sits in front of a neatly trimmed hedge. It is the perfect spot for those who wish to rest and allow their pets or children to play along the grass fronting the roadway. A small stone well complete with a dipper stands ready to slake the thirst of those who travel this way or who need a breather.  A small stone well and a street lantern are here.

[Right Street.]

A neatly trimmed hedge with a small strip of grass fronts the road that travels between the Spurian Housing District and the center of town. A well dressed Frontacian woman hurries along the path as two immaculately dressed Guards lead a criminal towards the jail. She sniffs in a haughty manner, and tips her hat down so she does not have to view the filth of the city.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.

[Right Street.]

A large wagon sits on the side of the street, its load having shifted and then toppled over. A Usil driver yells at his two Oog-ra helpers, explaining to them that the armoire should be sitting upright and not on its side. They scratch themselves in confusion, and you can hear them muttering something about leaving it on its side, so it does not fall again. There will be a resident who is unhappy with their purchase this evening.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.

[Right Street.]

Right Street ends at a gateway leading to the Housing and Administration District. Those living in this portion of town travel comfortably either by conveyance or by foot. Beautiful flowers grow on both sides of the well tended, freshly painted gate. In front, standing crisply at attention, a Guard tips his hat in greeting to all those who pass.  An open iron gate and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Gateway.]

You are just inside the gateway between the Justice District and the Town Square. Most of those heading into the Justice District have a grim look about them. Then again, it could just be the chains. A small sign stands off to the side.  An open iron gate, a street lantern, and a wooden sign are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Law Road & Shoteron Way.]

Law Road from the south and Shoteron Way from the east join before turning toward Town Square to the northwest. If one stays at this location long enough, they see the irony of these two roads joining. Most who are escorted south along Law Road are the criminals and ne'er-do-wells of the Spur, while those travel along Shoteron Way are the upper class residents whom live further east. Two office building, the City Planners Office and the Archmage's office stand on opposite sides of the road, each one neatly kept and freshly painted.  A street lantern and an open morbius door are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area is Castin the Anthian.
Obvious paths: east* south* northwest*.

[Law Road.]

The colorful city and its multitude of citizens seem to have vanished. The drab, grim grey walls of the buildings that line Law Road are the only things to greet those who travel this cobblestone street. City guards head in both directions, most escorting prisoners to their final destinations in the city jail. The city's clocktower can be seen to the south.  A street lantern, an open neatly painted oak door, and a lettered brass sign above the door are here.

This area is illuminated.

>[Shoteron Way.]

A shadowy black twisted free form metal sculpture stands on a small patch of grass at the beginning of Shoteron Way. Its unique design catches the light of both the sun and the moon. Below the memorial are several small items that have been left in passing. The well-manicured cobblestone path shows signs that it is well traveled, with enough room for even the largest cart or Leuian family.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).

>[Shoteron Way.]

A low hedge grows between the Spurian Wall and the street. Flowers bloom on the hedge, and cheer up what might be a dreary view. Two guards lean over the tall wall and call down greetings to those who pass. At any time of the day, one may pass a Fir Elf on the way to market, or a Hithual stumbling home to sleep.  A street lantern and an open large wrought iron gate are here.

>[Cobblestone Lane.]

Several well placed street lanterns line the well kept cobblestone path. A towering oak tree sits off to the side of the path. Its leaves blow and twist displaying its various mint green colors. Nestled in its branches several blue birds call back and forth to one another in song. Floating grey clouds pass by overhead.  An open large wrought iron gate, a colorful cobblestone path, and a glowing tall wrought iron street lantern are here.

>[Cobblestone Lane.]

Adjacent to the street lanterns, two wooden benches lay next to the cobblestone path. A fluttering yellow and orange butterfly flits back and forth amongst large lilac trees displaying their purple hues. A gentle breeze picks up the sweet scent of the purple flowers and carries it across the lane.  A colorful cobblestone path, a glowing tall wrought iron street lantern, a rosewood bench, and a flowering lilac tree are here.

[Cobblestone Lane.]

An ivy-covered wrought iron fence lines the cobblestone path to the west. Intricately sculpted hedges and elegant flower arrangements adorn the lawn behind it. Ivy has crept over to the street lanterns and entwined their way to the top. An enchanting landscape of lush green fields, adorned with vibrant flowers and trees can be seen in both directions. >[Majestic Pine Lane.]

Two tall pines stand sentinel on either side of the small white stone lane. A neatly manicured lawn rides up against a smooth stone wall on both the southern and northern property line. The white road is made up of identically sized white stones that are so perfectly fitted together it is hard to tell that the road is not one long single piece. A single wooden bench sits under one of the larger trees, a nice place to rest and reflect.  An open large pine gate is here.

>[Majestic Pine Lane.]

The broad expanse of lawn is dotted with pine cones and various animals. The wind blowing through the tall pine trees whistles as the mighty branches sway and dance far above. The white stone road splits as it heads towards the east, leading towards several sets of low slung bungalows. On the north side of the road a small cottage sits nestled among the trees. On the south side of the road a handsome two-story building a sign hanging on the front is carved with the single word, "Office."  A closed intricate steelwood door and a closed solid bluesteel door are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area is Castin the Anthian.
Obvious paths: northeast* southeast* west*.
>[Majestic Pine Lane, North.]

Set among the large pine trees are four small white bungalows. Each with a uniquely colored door. They are set in an "L" shape, two of them north of the road and two of them east, a mirror reflection of the bungalows to the south. In front of each home is a beautiful garden, created to reflect the personality of those who live within. A well manicured courtyard sits in front of the homes dotted with smaller pines and benches. Small rabbits hop along unmolested nibbling upon the lush grass.  A closed blue pine door, a closed tan pine door, a closed red pine door, and a closed white pine door are here.

This area is illuminated.

>[Bungalow.]

Thick plank floors are covered with a beautiful white and gold rug. Set upon the rug is a large overstuffed golden sofa. Threads of what look like pure spun gold run vertically throughout the sofa catching even the tiniest of light and reflecting it out to the walls of the bungalow. Behind a white slatted divider is a large bed, its white downy comforter falling to the floor. Beneath a large picture window that looks over the courtyard is a small wooden table with two chairs, perfect for a meal with a view.  An open white pine door, a large comfortable bed, a closed gold-trimmed white walnut chest, a glowing crystal orb, and a white framed glass window are here.

This room is illuminated.

>[Bungalow.]

Thick plank floors are covered with a beautiful white and gold rug. Set upon the rug is a large overstuffed golden sofa. Threads of what look like pure spun gold run vertically throughout the sofa catching even the tiniest of light and reflecting it out to the walls of the bungalow. Behind a white slatted divider is a large bed, its white downy comforter falling to the floor. Beneath a large picture window that looks over the courtyard is a small wooden table with two chairs, perfect for a meal with a view.  A closed white pine door, a large comfortable bed, an open gold-trimmed white walnut chest, a glowing crystal orb, and a white framed glass window are here.

This room is illuminated.
You see the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the room is Castin the Anthian.
Obvious exits: None.

>[Majestic Pine Lane, North.]

Set among the large pine trees are four small white bungalows. Each with a uniquely colored door. They are set in an "L" shape, two of them north of the road and two of them east, a mirror reflection of the bungalows to the south. In front of each home is a beautiful garden, created to reflect the personality of those who live within. A well manicured courtyard sits in front of the homes dotted with smaller pines and benches. Small rabbits hop along unmolested nibbling upon the lush grass.  A closed blue pine door, a closed tan pine door, a closed red pine door, and a closed white pine door are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: south* southwest*.

Castin looks like a 5'0" standard adolescent light boned, muscular bodied Anthian Forester.
He has shoulder length, unbridled, fine platinum blonde hair, with reddish brown eyes, and looks casual.
He appears to be sleepy right now.
He bears the mark of Elindale.
He can be attacked by other players.

On his back is a pair of blazing burnt sienna wings that blend into ivory white tips.

On his right shoulder is a tattoo a vine covered tome of Elindale.

On his left calf is a tribal vine tattoo.

He appears to be in perfect health.

[Majestic Pine Lane, South.]

Forming an "L" shape, four cute white bungalows sit along the east and south edge of a large courtyard. Each home has a garden filled with lush flowers, small bushes and miniature trees, surrounded by a white picket fence. The doors of the little bungalows are all different colors, as if to match the personality of the owner. The lush lawn that spreads out to the north and another matching set of homes is dotted with smaller pine trees, pine cones littering the ground and occasionally squirrels popping their head out of their homes to take in the scenery.  A closed grey pine door, a closed pale yellow pine door, a closed brown pine door, and a closed deep crimson pine door are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Majestic Pine Lane.]

The broad expanse of lawn is dotted with pine cones and various animals. The wind blowing through the tall pine trees whistles as the mighty branches sway and dance far above. The white stone road splits as it heads towards the east, leading towards several sets of low slung bungalows. On the north side of the road a small cottage sits nestled among the trees. On the south side of the road a handsome two-story building a sign hanging on the front is carved with the single word, "Office."  A closed intricate steelwood door and a closed solid bluesteel door are here.

[Majestic Pine Lane.]

Two tall pines stand sentinel on either side of the small white stone lane. A neatly manicured lawn rides up against a smooth stone wall on both the southern and northern property line. The white road is made up of identically sized white stones that are so perfectly fitted together it is hard to tell that the road is not one long single piece. A single wooden bench sits under one of the larger trees, a nice place to rest and reflect.  A closed large pine gate is here.

[Shoteron Way.]

A low hedge grows between the Spurian Wall and the street. Flowers bloom on the hedge, and cheer up what might be a dreary view. Two guards lean over the tall wall and call down greetings to those who pass. At any time of the day, one may pass a Fir Elf on the way to market, or a Hithual stumbling home to sleep.  A street lantern and an open large wrought iron gate are here.

This area is illuminated.

[Shoteron Way.]

A shadowy black twisted free form metal sculpture stands on a small patch of grass at the beginning of Shoteron Way. Its unique design catches the light of both the sun and the moon. Below the memorial are several small items that have been left in passing. The well-manicured cobblestone path shows signs that it is well traveled, with enough room for even the largest cart or Leuian family.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area is Castin the Anthian.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

You follow Castin west...

[Law Road & Shoteron Way.]

Law Road from the south and Shoteron Way from the east join before turning toward Town Square to the northwest. If one stays at this location long enough, they see the irony of these two roads joining. Most who are escorted south along Law Road are the criminals and ne'er-do-wells of the Spur, while those travel along Shoteron Way are the upper class residents whom live further east. Two office building, the City Planners Office and the Archmage's office stand on opposite sides of the road, each one neatly kept and freshly painted.  A street lantern and an open morbius door are here.

This area is illuminated.

You are just inside the gateway between the Justice District and the Town Square. Most of those heading into the Justice District have a grim look about them. Then again, it could just be the chains. [Right Street.]

Right Street ends at a gateway leading to the Housing and Administration District. Those living in this portion of town travel comfortably either by conveyance or by foot. Beautiful flowers grow on both sides of the well tended, freshly painted gate. In front, standing crisply at attention, a Guard tips his hat in greeting to all those who pass.  An open iron gate and a street lantern are here.

[Right Street.]

A large wagon sits on the side of the street, its load having shifted and then toppled over. A Usil driver yells at his two Oog-ra helpers, explaining to them that the armoire should be sitting upright and not on its side. They scratch themselves in confusion, and you can hear them muttering something about leaving it on its side, so it does not fall again. There will be a resident who is unhappy with their purchase this evening.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.

[Right Street.]

A neatly trimmed hedge with a small strip of grass fronts the road that travels between the Spurian Housing District and the center of town. A well dressed Frontacian woman hurries along the path as two immaculately dressed Guards lead a criminal towards the jail. She sniffs in a haughty manner, and tips her hat down so she does not have to view the filth of the city.  A street lantern is here.

[Right Street.]

A polished wooden bench sits in front of a neatly trimmed hedge. It is the perfect spot for those who wish to rest and allow their pets or children to play along the grass fronting the roadway. A small stone well complete with a dipper stands ready to slake the thirst of those who travel this way or who need a breather.  A small stone well and a street lantern are here.

[Right Street.]

The road between the center of town and the housing district is well kept and maintained. Ruts are immediately repaired and small bushes and flowers line the way. The class of people that travel this way are better dressed and obviously of a higher class. Occasionally guards can be seen taking criminals towards the jail in an efficient and orderly manner.  A street lantern and a pair of open wide mahogany doors are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st townsman, the 1st psycian town crier, and the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area is Castin the Anthian.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.

You follow Castin northwest...

[Town Square.]

The elegant Hotel Royale towers above the street, its emerald door sparkling in the light. The patrons that stroll in and out are catered to, doors opened and closed for them, and baggage and packages carried by harried servants. The large Bank of Spur sits on the east side of the square. Its location close to the Royale is not a coincidence. A gold-trimmed door is proof of the success of this branch of the Spurian bank and those who run it.  An elegant gold-trimmed walnut door, open emerald steel door, and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area is Castin the Anthian.
Obvious paths: north* southeast* west* northwest*.

You follow Castin northwest...

[Town Square Center.]

A beautiful fountain, sculpted from pristine white marble, rests at the center of Spur's main square. Clear, sparkling water sprays from a spout at the fountain's tip and cascades down several tiers before spilling into a circular pool. High above the square, the wings of two imperial stone dragons form an arch for a massive gateway. The colossal monument stands at the heart of the city like a silent sentinel keeping watch over the entire realm. Lifelike marble statues decorate the square's perimeter, each a celebrated hero of Spur's past.   A flowing white marble fountain, some crystal flecked granite oliphant-shaped benches, a cracked marble statue of a Human, a carved marble statue of a Dragon, a rosewood sign, some flaming ruby ashes, a deep fluffy snow drift, a worn leather money belt, a cracked vial of swamp gas, a flagon of spiced Silverforge Dark ale, a frosted glass bottle of sailor's milk, and an enameled blue porcelain jug are here.

This area is illuminated.
You see the 1st wolf (wearing a small gold collar) and the 1st calico cat (wearing a small gold collar).
In the area are Stanrar the Noble Human, Wintersbreeze the San Elf, Kinson the San Elf, Castin the Anthian, Kalessin the Noble Drake, Mandolyn the San Elf, and Kagee the Noble San Elf.
Obvious paths: north* northeast* east* southeast* south* southwest* west* northwest*.

>[Right Street.]

The road between the center of town and the housing district is well kept and maintained. Ruts are immediately repaired and small bushes and flowers line the way. The class of people that travel this way are better dressed and obviously of a higher class. Occasionally guards can be seen taking criminals towards the jail in an efficient and orderly manner.  A street lantern and a pair of open wide mahogany doors are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.
se
se
[Right Street.]

A polished wooden bench sits in front of a neatly trimmed hedge. It is the perfect spot for those who wish to rest and allow their pets or children to play along the grass fronting the roadway. A small stone well complete with a dipper stands ready to slake the thirst of those who travel this way or who need a breather.  A small stone well and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.
[Right Street.]

A neatly trimmed hedge with a small strip of grass fronts the road that travels between the Spurian Housing District and the center of town. A well dressed Frontacian woman hurries along the path as two immaculately dressed Guards lead a criminal towards the jail. She sniffs in a haughty manner, and tips her hat down so she does not have to view the filth of the city.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.
[Right Street.]

A large wagon sits on the side of the street, its load having shifted and then toppled over. A Usil driver yells at his two Oog-ra helpers, explaining to them that the armoire should be sitting upright and not on its side. They scratch themselves in confusion, and you can hear them muttering something about leaving it on its side, so it does not fall again. There will be a resident who is unhappy with their purchase this evening.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* northwest*.
[Right Street.]

Right Street ends at a gateway leading to the Housing and Administration District. Those living in this portion of town travel comfortably either by conveyance or by foot. Beautiful flowers grow on both sides of the well tended, freshly painted gate. In front, standing crisply at attention, a Guard tips his hat in greeting to all those who pass.  An open iron gate and a street lantern are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: northwest*.
You cannot move in that direction.

[Gateway.]

You are just inside the gateway between the Justice District and the Town Square. Most of those heading into the Justice District have a grim look about them. Then again, it could just be the chains. A small sign stands off to the side.  An open iron gate, a street lantern, and a wooden sign are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: southeast* south*.

[Law Road & Shoteron Way.]

Law Road from the south and Shoteron Way from the east join before turning toward Town Square to the northwest. If one stays at this location long enough, they see the irony of these two roads joining. Most who are escorted south along Law Road are the criminals and ne'er-do-wells of the Spur, while those travel along Shoteron Way are the upper class residents whom live further east. Two office building, the City Planners Office and the Archmage's office stand on opposite sides of the road, each one neatly kept and freshly painted.  A street lantern and an open morbius door are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* south* northwest*.
e
>[Shoteron Way.]

A shadowy black twisted free form metal sculpture stands on a small patch of grass at the beginning of Shoteron Way. Its unique design catches the light of both the sun and the moon. Below the memorial are several small items that have been left in passing. The well-manicured cobblestone path shows signs that it is well traveled, with enough room for even the largest cart or Leuian family.  A street lantern is here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.
go gate
[Shoteron Way.]

A low hedge grows between the Spurian Wall and the street. Flowers bloom on the hedge, and cheer up what might be a dreary view. Two guards lean over the tall wall and call down greetings to those who pass. At any time of the day, one may pass a Fir Elf on the way to market, or a Hithual stumbling home to sleep.  A street lantern and a closed large wrought iron gate are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: east* west*.

>[Cobblestone Lane.]

Several well placed street lanterns line the well kept cobblestone path. A towering oak tree sits off to the side of the path. Its leaves blow and twist displaying its various mint green colors. An open large wrought iron gate, a colorful cobblestone path, and a glowing tall wrought iron street lantern are here.

>[Majestic Pine Lane.]

Two tall pines stand sentinel on either side of the small white stone lane. A neatly manicured lawn rides up against a smooth stone wall on both the southern and northern property line. The white road is made up of identically sized white stones that are so perfectly fitted together it is hard to tell that the road is not one long single piece. A single wooden bench sits under one of the larger trees, a nice place to rest and reflect.  An open large pine gate is here.

[Majestic Pine Lane.]

The broad expanse of lawn is dotted with pine cones and various animals. The wind blowing through the tall pine trees whistles as the mighty branches sway and dance far above. The white stone road splits as it heads towards the east, leading towards several sets of low slung bungalows. On the north side of the road a small cottage sits nestled among the trees. On the south side of the road a handsome two-story building a sign hanging on the front is carved with the single word, "Office."  A closed intricate steelwood door and a closed solid bluesteel door are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: northeast* southeast* west*.
[Majestic Pine Lane, North.]

Set among the large pine trees are four small white bungalows. Each with a uniquely colored door. They are set in an "L" shape, two of them north of the road and two of them east, a mirror reflection of the bungalows to the south. In front of each home is a beautiful garden, created to reflect the personality of those who live within. A well manicured courtyard sits in front of the homes dotted with smaller pines and benches. Small rabbits hop along unmolested nibbling upon the lush grass.  A closed blue pine door, a closed tan pine door, a closed red pine door, and a closed white pine door are here.

This area is illuminated.
Obvious paths: south* southwest*.

[Bungalow.]

Thick plank floors are covered with a beautiful white and gold rug. Set upon the rug is a large overstuffed golden sofa. Threads of what look like pure spun gold run vertically throughout the sofa catching even the tiniest of light and reflecting it out to the walls of the bungalow. Behind a white slatted divider is a large bed, its white downy comforter falling to the floor. Beneath a large picture window that looks over the courtyard is a small wooden table with two chairs, perfect for a meal with a view.  An open white pine door, a large comfortable bed, a closed gold-trimmed white walnut chest, a glowing crystal orb, and a white framed glass window are here.
